Now with a new Android themed interface! Unlike many Bible trivia apps all of our ads are are filtered and should not have any inappropriate material whatsoever. Q&A Q: What translation does the app use? A: Since many of our users submit questions, the Bible text within questions can be from multiple translations. App Support If you have any feature requests, suggestions or you simply need help, please email us: About Salem Communications Salem Communications is a Christ-centered, for-profit corporation, dedicated to building up the Church, which is the Body of Christ.

description: Now you and your friends can see who is the quickest with I Buzzed First! Have you ever wanted to host your own quiz, but needed an easy way to know who is the first to answer? I Buzzed First! is the app you need. One phone acts as the 'Quiz Master', and any number of Contestants (on separate phones) connect to the quiz. When you're ready to start, the Quiz Master starts the first round, and the buzzer buttons on all the Contenstant's phones light up. The first Contestant to press their buzzer is rewarded with a satisfying sound, and locks all the other Contestants out. Then the Quiz Master starts the next round, and off you go again! Great for setting up quiz bowl / game show buzzer / trivia party / Jeopardy gameshow type events when you need to buzz in. I Buzzed First! even tells everyone in the quiz the name of the person who buzzed first. Any number of Contestants can connect to the same quiz. NOTE: The app will need to be installed on at least THREE phones to be useful. One phone acts as the 'Quiz Master', and two (or many more) other phones join the quiz to see who buzzes first. All the phones MUST be connected to the same WiFi network. (Will not work on 2/3G only) * Fully Compatible with the iPhone version of I Buzzed First! * You can form a quiz with any combination of Android Phones and iPhones running I Buzzed First! Please send any support questions to support@ibuzzedfirst.com for a speedy response

description: Quizomania is a ultimate knowledge challenge. This quiz game contains many game modes that will satisfy almost every quiz lover. It has been spiced up with smooth animations and impressive graphics that will surely impress you. Also this game doesn't require a internet connection, so you can enjoy it anywhere completely free! FEATURES ----------------- - 3 types of game modes (normal quiz, stages mode, survival mode) - 8 innovative jokers (Immunity, Skipper, 50:50, Buy time, Pause time, Eliminate one or two wrong answers. Change question) - More then 3 thousands of questions - 11 categories (Science, History, Biology, General knowledge, Culture, Geography, Literature, Movies, Music, Sport) - 13 achievements (bronze, silver and gold medals) - Highscore list for normal quiz and survival game mode - Questions are divided into 3 difficulties - Beautiful High definition graphic Normal quiz Goal is to answer 18 questions before time runs out. Questions are divided in three difficulties. If you need help you can buy jokers with score points and try to finish the game and get a bonus for your highscore. Stages mode Play in 8 different categories and combine score to unlock new more challenging levels. You are allowed to use help of jokers, but use it carefully because every point counts. Survival mode Try to stay in the game as long as you can without help. Wrong answer won't end the game, but will reduce play time. Every correct answer will increase play time, so choose your answers carefully. Jockers explanation: - Immunity Immunity jocker is jocker that will save you from giving a wrong answer. Immunity is an ultimate saver! - Skipper This jocker will allow you to skip given question. Really useful when playing normal quiz mode. - 50:50 This one is a well know but jet really desirable help. It will eliminate 2 wrong answers so you will have at least 50% chance to answer correctly - Buy time A must if you are short on game time, or you wish to think a bit longer! - Pause time Or we call it a freezer. Jocker that will allow you to freeze time on current question and think without stress or find an answer on internet :) - Change question This one will change your current question with another one of the same difficulties. Could be a great help if you feel lucky. Please be careful when buying jockers because you are buying them with the points you earned with correct answers. Also don't forget to try Immunity and Skipper. They are ultimate tool to help you! ----------- If you will have any problems with the game feel free to contact us via our contact form http://lightningstudio.net/index.php/contact and we will gladly help you.

Play this fairytale game featuring Sleeping Beauty. A king and a queen become the proud parents of a beautiful baby daughter, and they organize a huge feast for all their family members and friends and also for the fairies in the country. There are thirteen fairies, but there are only 12 golden plates, that's why the king doesn't invite one of the fairies. This fairy gets very upset. After the feast all the fairies wish the little baby all the best, but after the eleventh fairy the angry, uninvited fairy comes storming into the castle. She predicts that the child will prick herself on the needle of a spinning wheel when she'll be fifteen years old, and that she'll sleep for a hundred years! The king summons to destroy all the spinning wheels in the country, but one's accidentally left in the castle tower. On her fifteenth birthday the princess is wandering through the castle, and she enters into the tower where nobody has been for years anymore. She sees the spinning wheel and wants to touch it, but then she pricks herself! The girl falls on the bed behind her, into a deep, deep sleep. The whole castle falls asleep, too; even the flies on the wall don't manage to stay awake. A thick thorn-hedge grows around the whole castle and nobody remembers anymore that once, there was a castle. One day, a prince passes by the thorn-edge and he hacks his way through it. There, inside the thorn-hedge, he finds the castle, full of sleeping people. He starts walking through the castle, higher and higher, until he reaches the tower and sees the princess asleep. He falls in love with her on the spot and kisses her, which awakes her all of a sudden! The whole castle wakes up and a wedding's organized for the prince and the princess. They lived happily ever after... In this game you can read the entire story. Spot the differences and go for the highest score. To play on your pc or laptop go to: http://www.mary.com/sleeping-beauty-find-the-differences.html

developer: F5 Web Design e Tecnologia Atualizada
description: O Manual de Medicamentos habitualmente utilizados em Pediatria da Nutrição Infantil da Nestlé é um aplicativo útil para o dia a dia dos profissionais de saúde, porque torna mais rápida e prática a busca por informações. É possível encontrar diversos medicamentos, organizados por categorias, princípios ativos, genéricos e originais. Além disso é possível realizar uma busca por termos específicos e adicionar aqueles mais consultados em sua área de Favoritos. Baixe já o aplicativo, disponível para celulares com Android, e tenha ao seu alcance todas as informações necessárias referente aos medicamentos mais usados na pediatria. O conteúdo deste aplicativo é restrito aos profissionais de saúde cadastrados no site www.nestlenutrition.com.br. Veja abaixo o que é preciso fazer para se cadastrar e acessar o aplicativo. Sobre o seu acesso 1. O conteúdo do aplicativo é exclusivo para profissionais da área da saúde, habilitados pelo respectivo órgão regulamentador de sua profissão (por exemplo: o CRM para os médicos). 2. Para acessar o conteúdo do aplicativo, o usuário precisa ser cadastrado no site Nutrição Infantil da Nestlé. Caso não possua cadastro, basta seguir os passos abaixo: a) Cadastre-se pela web para não consumir a banda 3G de seu aparelho. b) O cadastro no site é pessoal e válido para todos os outros sites Nestlé. Ou seja, com o mesmo cadastro, o usuário pode entrar em diferentes sites de produtos, marcas e serviços da Nestlé. Para mais detalhes, acesse http://www.nestlenutrition.com.br/app c) Efetuado o cadastro, o usuário terá acesso temporário ao Manual de Medicamentos até que seu cadastro seja validado pela equipe responsável da Nestlé. d) Caso o cadastro seja aprovado, o acesso será mantido. Em caso de desaprovação, o usuário perderá seu acesso ao aplicativo (esta restrição não impedirá o acesso aos demais sites Nestlé). e) Em caso de dúvida, é possível entrar em contato com o serviço ao consumidor pelo telefone 0800-7701599. 3. Só é possível acessar o conteúdo do aplicativo estando conectado à internet. Isso acontece porque os dados de login precisam ser validados com os dados cadastrados no site Nutrição Infantil. Como fazer o login 1. Preencha os campos de E-mail e Senha cadastrados no site Nutrição Infantil ou no Portal Nestlé. Em seguida, clique no botão “Entrar”. 2. A funcionalidade de Login Automático serve para que você não precise preencher o login sempre que tiver fechado o aplicativo. Para ativá-la, é só clicar e habilitar o seu respectivo botão. 3. Caso não consiga lembrar sua senha cadastrada, clique no botão “Esqueci minha senha”. Você será direcionado para o site Nutrição Infantil, onde deverá informar seu e-mail ou CPF. Em seguida, uma mensagem com os seus dados de acesso será automaticamente encaminhada para o seu e-mail. The Medicines Handbook commonly used in Pediatrics Child Nutrition Nestlé is a useful application for day to day health professionals, because it makes it fast and convenient to search for information. You can find several medications, organized by categories, active ingredients, generics and original. Furthermore it is possible to conduct a search for specific terms and to add those of interest in your area of ​​Favorites. Download the app now available for Android phones, and have at your fingertips all the necessary information regarding the most commonly used drugs in pediatrics. The content of this application is restricted to health professionals registered on the site www.nestlenutrition.com.br. Here's what you need to do to register and access the application. About access 1. Application content is exclusively for health care professionals, enabled by their regulatory body for your profession (eg CRM for doctors). 2. To access the contents of the application, the user needs to be registered on the site of Nestle Infant Nutrition. If you have no registration, just follow the steps below: a) Join the web not to consume your band 3G handset. b) The registration on the site is personal and valid for all other Nestlé websites. Ie, with the same registration, the user can enter different websites of products, services and brands of Nestlé. For more details, visit http://www.nestlenutrition.com.br/app c) Effected registration, the user will have temporary access to Medicines Handbook until your registration is validated by the team responsible for Nestlé. d) If the registration is approved, access will be maintained. In case of disapproval, the user will lose their access to the application (this restriction does not prevent access to other Nestlé sites). e) In case of doubt, you can contact customer service by phone 0800-7701599. 3. You can only access the contents of the application being connected to the internet. This is because the login data need to be validated with the data registered on the site Child Nutrition. How to login 1. Fill in the e-mail address and password registered with the site or the Child Nutrition Nestle Portal. Then click the "Login" button. 2. Automatic Login functionality is so that you do not need to fill in the login when you closed the application. To activate it, just click and enable your respective button. 3. If you can not remember your password registered, click on the "Forgot Password". You will be directed to the Child Nutrition website, where you should enter your e-mail or CPF. Then a message with your data access will be automatically forwarded to your email.

description: Try this Endless Ninja Quest Game! * The power in one! Ninja vs infinite! How many Levels & Rounds can you survive? Fight back the enemies with your Ninja Stars in this action packed platform game! This is a ninja game like no other, enjoy ENDLESS gaming in this innovative action game. Each Level more and more stronger enemies will appear. This Mode contains a Purple Boss Monster who will appear at Level 5, watch as he jumps over your Ninja Stars and makes quick charges at you! Can you defeat them all? Beach Battle Mode: In this mode you will have to defeat a certain number of Pink Penguins each Round. Be careful though they are a lot stronger than you think! Pink Penguins drop the best loot, every Round they will drop more and more Gold. This is a great mode to stock up on your Gold and really power up your Ninja's stats! Ninja is an endless Survival/Quest Game. Use skill and strategy to defeat your foes and advance to the Next Level or Round. If you’ve enjoyed Epic Ninja please support us with your 5 Star rating!

description: GPS АнтиРадар работает как радар-детектор и предупредит Вас о стационарных камерах (камеры контроля скорости) и радарах ДПС на Вашем пути. Если при приближении к камере Ваша скорость будет выше разрешенной более чем на 19 км/ч, то приложение будет подавать предупреждающие звуки. А это важно, т.к. теперь штраф за превышение на >20 км/ч уже начинается с 500 рублей. Карта с камерами в нашей базе - http://map.gpsantiradar.info/ *** Хорошая новость! *** Теперь есть бесплатная версия GPS АнтиРадар. Вы можете оценить и протестировать программу на вашем устройстве и в своем городе абсолютно бесплатно - http://goo.gl/u7Z7AJ Приложение работает с помощью известных данных о расположении стационарных камер и радаров ДПС (такие как Стрелка или Старт СТ) и других объектов. Есть возможность добавить недостающие камеры вручную и синхронизация их между пользователями! Вам не нужно ждать пока мы добавим камеры, она пополняется просто и удобно самими пользователями! Настоящий радар-детектор, конечно, работает надежнее, но и стоит более чем в 100 раз дороже этого приложения. GPS АнтиРадар может работать в фоне, т.е. вы можете использовать его совместно с навигатором. Сообщения о камерах или постах ДПС будут выводиться с помощью голосовых уведомлений. Внимание! GPS АнтиРадар - это ваш помощник, но не гарант отсутствия штрафов, т.к. новые камеры могут не сразу попадать в базу данных. Пожалуйста, соблюдайте правила дорожного движения. В настоящий момент приложение содержит карту камер и радаров для: – России Наша группа ВКонтакте - http://vk.com/public59336195 Официальная страница Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/pages/%D0%90%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%A0%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%80/201419256701196?fref=ts Здесь вы можете оставить свои пожелания, комментарии, информацию о недостающих камерах и т.д. --------------------------------------------------------- Часто задаваемые вопросы: 1. Приложение не может найти GPS сигнал. Что делать? Работа GPS зависит от многих факторов, в том числе погоды. Многие программы, например навигации, используют кроме GPS, GSM триангуляцию по сотовым вышкам (мы ее не используем в виду большой погрешности). – Выйдите на открытое пространство. GPS сигнал не будет найден в квартире или другом закрытом помещении. – Убедитесь, что модуль GPS включен. При включении GPS АнтиРадар в панели событий Android должно появиться системное уведомление о работе GPS. – Попробуйте выключить и заново включить GPS модуль. 2. Отсутствует звуковое оповещение. Что делать? – Убедитесь, что громкость всех типов уведомлений установлена на максимум. Найти эту настройку можно по следующему пути: откройте стандартные настройки Android -> Звук -> Громкость. – Убедитесь, что в GPS АнтиРадар не установлен чекбокс "только скорость". Это позволит воспроизводить звук не нарушая ПДД. – Проверьте работу проехав рядом с камерой. Как только на экране появляется тип камеры и скорость ограничения этой камеры должен прозвучать звуковой сигнал. – При подключении устройства к магнитоле автомобиля с помощью Bluetooth, убедитесь, что другие приложения могу воспроизводить звуковые уведомления. 3. Я раньше использовал бесплатную версию и затем купил Premium, но приложение не изменилось / Я не могу установить Premium версию – Пожалуйста, удалите все предыдущие версии и поставьте еще раз Premium с GooglePlay по ссылке https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.StrelkaSD. 4. Сняли деньги два раза. Почему? – Это особенность работы Google Play, как правило они в тот же день возвращают деньги сами, без дополнительных действий. Наше приложение не занимается какими-либо операциями с деньгами. GPS radar detector works like a radar detector and alert you to the stationary cameras (speed cameras) and radar DPS on your way. If you are approaching the camera, your speed will be higher than allowed by more than 19 km / h, the application will serve warning sounds. And this is important because Now the penalty for excess> 20 km / h already starts from 500 rubles. Map with cameras in our database - http://map.gpsantiradar.info/ *** Good news! *** Now there's a free version of GPS radar detector. You can evaluate and test the program on your device and in your city absolutely free - http://goo.gl/u7Z7AJ The application works with the known data on the location of fixed cameras and radar DPS (such as arrows or Start PT) and other objects. It is possible to add the missing camera and manually synchronize them between users! You do not need to wait until we add the camera, it is easy and convenient updated by the users themselves! This radar detector, of course, works reliably, but it also costs more than 100 times the price of this app. GPS radar detector can work in the background, ie, you can use it in conjunction with the navigator. Posts about cameras or traffic police posts will be displayed with voice notifications. Warning! GPS radar detector - this is your assistant, but not warranted to be free of fines, because New cameras can not immediately get into the database. Please observe the rules of the road. At the moment, the application contains a map of cameras and radars for: - Russia Our group VKontakte - http://vk.com/public59336195 Official page of Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/pages/%D0%90%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B8%D0%A0%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%80/201419256701196?fref=ts Here you can leave your suggestions, comments, information about the missing camera, etc. -------------------------------------------------- ------- FAQ: 1. An application can not find a GPS signal. What to do? Work GPS depends on many factors, including weather. Many programs, such as navigation, use other than GPS, GSM triangulation on cell towers (we do not use it in view of the large error). - Get out into the open. GPS signal can not be found in an apartment or other enclosed area. - Ensure that the GPS module is switched on. When the GPS radar detector in the event of the Android system notification should appear on GPS. - Try to disable and re-enable the GPS. 2. There is no audible alarm. What to do? - Ensure that the volume of all types of notifications is set to maximum. Find this can be in the following location: Open the default settings Android -> Sound -> Volume. - Make sure that the GPS radar detector is not installed checkbox "only the speed." You can then play the sound without breaking the traffic rules. - Check the operation after passing next to the camera. As soon as the display shows the type of camera and speed limit of the camera you will hear a beep. - When connecting the device to the radio car using Bluetooth, make sure that other applications can play sound notifications.   3. I have previously used the free version, and then bought a Premium, but the application has not changed / I can not install the Premium version - Please remove all previous versions and put more time with Premium GooglePlay link https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.StrelkaSD. 4. They took the money twice. How Come? - This is a feature of Google Play, as a rule they are in the same day, the money will return, without further action. Our application is not engaged in any transactions with money.
release_text: Друзья, мы получили много писем про звуковую нотификацию при старте приложения. Это обновление убирает стандартный звуковой сигнал при старте, теперь он не будет мешать вам ночью :) Также мы поправили несколько ошибок, которые могли происходить при синхронизации объектов добавленных пользователями. Спасибо, за ваши отзывы и поддержку!

Snowwhite plays the starring role in this game. In the winter a queen is sowing in her black window sill, it is snowing outside. The queen accidentally pricks herself in her finger, and three drops of blood fall in the snow. She makes a wish: she would like to have a child with skin white as snow, lips as red as blood and hair as black as the window sill. The queen gives birth to a girl and calls her Snow White, but shortly after the queen passes away. The king marries a new woman just a year later, this woman wants to be the most beautiful in the country, she asks her magic mirror every day: "Mirror, mirror, on the wall, who's the fairest of them all?" Every time the mirror reveals she is the most beautiful, until Snowwhite grows up to be a beautiful young woman. The queen can't stand it, she becomes furious. She calls for a hunter, the hunter is ordered to take Snow White into the forest and kill her there. The hunter lets Snow White get away because he doesn't want to kill her. Snow White finds a tiny house in the forest, in which she finds seven plates and seven cups on the table, and seven little beds. She is so tired she falls asleep in one of the beds. The seven dwarfs come home and see Snowwhite sleeping in one of their beds. When she wakes up they tell her she can stay if she keeps the house nice and clean, and if she make sure not to open the door for anyone but them! The queen is told by the mirror that Snowwhite is still alive. She transforms herself into an old lady, with beautiful red apples, and visits her. The apple is poisonous, but Snow White takes a bite anyway and falls to the floor. The dwarfs are overcome by sadness and grief when they come home and find her there. They make a glass coffin in which they lay Snow White to rest, they cry and cry. One day a prince passes the coffin and falls in love with the beautiful girl laying there. He asks the dwarfs if he can open the coffin to get a better look at her. The dwarfs carry the coffin down the hill, but it falls to the ground. The piece of apple Snow White swallowed shoots from her throat, waking her up! The prince asks if she wants to marry him, and she would love to. The prince takes Snow White to his castle, and the dwarfs can come visit them whenever they want! In this game you will get to know the whole story. Find the difference between the pictures and try to beat the high score!

description: akRDC - VNC viewer - Remote desktop control (Free version) If akRDC doesn't work for you, please ask for help through the “Send email" button in Google Play, we will certainly be able to resolve the problem. thank you. -> PRO Version : - Compressed files transfer stream - Compressed directory files list (with TightVNC server, akRDC PRO only) - Direct support. - No Ad -> The Free version displays an Advertisement at the application startup only. akRDC is a Remote Desktop Control software compatible with the RFB protocol (VNC Client) and tested on servers: TightVNC, UltraVNC, RealVNC (without encryption), Ubuntu Remote Desktop (servers ready with the RFB protocol...) * App languages: English, French, Russian, Italian, German, Espagnol, Japanese, Korean * Files Transfer (For TighVNC and UltraVNC servers only right now + X11VNC in Ultra VNC mode): - Transfer (download and upload) files and complete directories structure. - Compressed files transfer stream (akRDC PRO only). - Compressed directory files list (with TightVNC server, akRDC PRO only) - Create / Delete directories. - Delete files. * Supports UltraVNC repeater/proxy in mode 1 * Function keys: - connection shortcuts - 3 buttons mouse + wheel emulation (volume key) - keyboard, quick keys (CTRL+C, ...), - Esc (Back key) - special keys (F1, F2...), - Zoom - Drag&drop - network band optimization. - configuration Import / export - hardware acceleration management (if the remote session view become BLACK, you have to disable the hardware acceleration) * RFB Protocol implementation: - supports TIGH, RAW, COPYRECT, RRE, HEXTILE and ZRLE encodings. - VNC password (DES encrypted authentication). - MS-Logon authentication ( for UltraVNC server) How to use: install a VNC server (TightVNC recommended) on your PC, create a new connection shortcut in AKRDC then connect to your server. The documentation available on www.akrdc.eu To make the CTRL ALT DEL command works, run the VNC server as a service, and allow the CTRL ALT DEL feature in your system.
release_text: 2015 January 31th: - new 'Duplicate' button to clone a connection shortcut - Removed Ads from the Files Transfert activity !! - Bug fix 2014 December 23th: - UltraVNC: selecting automatically the first fixed drive - better error messages on low memory exception 2014 July 12th: Fixed: black screen on some devices Max zoom set to *5 2014 June 28th: Korea translation fixed some bugs 2014 June 15th: Targeting Android 14 Introducing action bars

Have no time to create meeting notes document? Meeting Tracker will do it for you in one click and will also send notification to all participants. Collaborate with your colleagues using meeting blog on Web. Features: * plan single or recurrent meetings * add participants from your contacts * set up meeting reminders * take meeting notes using text, photo, video and audio recording * publish meeting notes on the Web including media content in Picasa, YouTube and SoundCloud * e-mail notification with meeting minutes blog link on web to other participants * generate meeting notes as a PDF file and email it to all participants NB! This application uses standard voice recording and gallery apps for adding media files to the meetings. If those apps are removed or replaced on your device (e.g. custom firmware installed), it may well be possible that you won't be able to add audio, photo or video files. ♠ Test Your Memory with Cards ♠ Get the best card memory game to kill time and practice your memory skills! This is a new free matching game that offers plenty of fun for the whole family! Improve your memory and concentration with this cool mind game and challenge your friends to beat your score! ♦ Flip the cards and match the same pictures! ♣ From easy to hard difficulty levels ♦ Choose from 3x2, 4x3, 6x4, 7x4 and 8x4 tables! ♣ Single player and multiplayer mode! ♦ Cute pictures will keep the kids entertained and interested! ♣ Perfect brain game for children and adults! If your children love playing addictive and “fun games”, 'Test Your Memory with Cards' is a perfect gameplay for them as it will definitely keep them busy for hours. However, this great free game is more than just fun – it also offers you the opportunity to exercise your brain and concentration skills and helps you improve memory. Moreover, just like a puzzle game, this one is an excellent social game suitable to play with friends as it includes a multi-player mode. Therefore, download the app for free and be sure that you'll never get bored. Instructions to play this brain training game game: Here is where you need to use your memory: you have to find and match the identical playing cards. Click on the first card and then, click on the others to find the playing card that is identical to the first one, and so on. Memorize quickly all the turning cards! This way, you'll be able to find them much easier and faster! Memory is not just one of many intellectual skills, it is the most important. This is because it directly effects every other intellectual process. Improve your brain health and performance with our amazing brain game designed to exercise memory! Match same cards and have fun! This is not just a brain memory game for kids, it is also excellent for adults! The object of this mind game is to find all matching pairs of cards. It seems quite simple to play but it actually requires sharp visual-memory skills. Once you match a pair of cards, they will stay turned over (face up). You need to get all the cards turned over in order to get to the next level. Challenge your friends to beat your score or play together in the multi-player mode. It is known that when it comes to boosting your child’s memory nothing works better than memory games. They are known to improve memory in kids and that too in an enjoyable manner. Research has shown that learning new things, doing puzzles and playing games helps the mind stay active. The most effective "memory games" allow you to improve your memory capacity and practice abstract thinking. If you give these games a try you will definitely find them amazing and will soon be obsessed with them. Memory games for kids are the best way to help your children develop their thinking and logic skills! Not only that they'll have so much fun playing this match game, they'll also benefit a lot from it! Matching cute pictures will keep their attention while pairing them will exercise their memorizing skills at the same time! Kids will find most of the puzzles intersting and will enjoy playing each one of them. But their memorizing skills will benefit the most from playing card matching games! You can download these memory games for children from the market and help your child to develop this cognitive ability, memory and concentration, which will be very beneficial to him in the later stages of his life.

description: Note: Only Supports Those Video files containing AAC audio track. (generally, all of the modern mobile phones) Did u ever wonder why you had to carry a copy of your favorite video and audio file. Or, you have a Video file with you, and you wanted to only listen to audio, on your trip to office. This Software aims to extract the audio from your media files. On Demand. It simply extracts and prepares a completely valid aac audio file, in case the media file has the audio track encoded in aac format. And it is very fast. It also does not re-encode the audio, and the extracted audio file has no kind of quality loss. I wanted such an app, to strip audio, to listen while travelling, as listening to audio on your audio players, enables you to add additional effects as supported by your device, and its harder and waste of your device's battery to view videos. Almost all the modern devices record audio in aac format. and so this software can extract such audio tracks, and you can play them in music players. Note: Tested only with unprotected media, like those recorded on your phone, and those which are not protected by any kind of DRM. Note: Tested to work on Galaxy S2 GT-I9100
release_text: Version 5: Adding support for devices that do not have the required codecs. Added a software codec component to handle the missing parts in codec missing devices. Version 4: Background extract now active. Version 3: persisting changes across app states

description: The Whistle Android Finder PRO is supreme Android finder (phone locator) application which helps many people locate their Android device with just a simple WHISTLE after losing it, forgetting it somewhere or being hidden somewhere in a room on a desk behind papers, in a briefcase or in a coat pocket etc. The free version of this application named Whistle Android Finder FREE (also available in Google Play) has reached more than 2 MILLION downloads!! But now, after reading and taking into account more than 15,000 user comments, wishes, and suggestions, it is time to upgrade the application with new features, several important whistle engine improvements, a better user interface, customized notification melodies, lower battery consumption and much more. This is the story about how Whistle Android Finder PRO was born! Here are the main features of the Whistle Android Finder PRO : In contrast to the free, ad-supported version, the paid Whistle Android Finder PRO does not include any ads! Furthermore, the set of requested permissions is much lower now. Only the essential permissions are requested. Much lower battery consumption due to optimized whistle detection engine when compared to the Whistle Android Finder FREE. The application has been designed and strongly optimised in order to reduce battery drain as much as possible. Customized whistle notification sounds are supported in PRO version. Simply select any MP3 or M4A music and apply it as notification! Under the Whistle Android Finder PRO settings tab it is also possible to choose among 20 different very amusing preloaded audio notification sounds to notify the presence of the detected whistle! Whistle Android Finder PRO can be enabled or disabled under the settings tab. Just run the application and the settings tab will appear! Remember: Whistle detection is working ONLY when the device is sleeping (i.e. when the screen is OFF). Once enabled, Whistle Android Finder PRO will work even if you reboot your Android device! Of course, you can disable it under the settings tab at any time. It is possible to choose among 5 different whistle detection sensitivity levels! Whistle Android Finder PRO is just ready to adapt to any Android device regardless of the specifics of integrated acoustic components. Once your whistle sound is detected, the Android device will respond to your whistling with playback of preselected audio notification signal. Furthermore, the display of a "sleeping" Android device is illuminated in order to easily locate your device in your bag or in a dark room for example. Under the preferences tab a user can also select (and approve) the usage of maximum possible volume for audio notification regardless of current media volume settings. However, Whistle Android Finder PRO is designed to resume your current media volume when audio notification is not played. Whistle Android Finder PRO is based on sophisticated but computationally optimised Digital Signal Processing techniques to analyse captured audio signals from the environment and search for distinct time-frequency patterns of a typical human whistle. The incorporated DSP algorithm is not signal energy based, therefore this whistle detector is much more accurate and reliable than similar applications found elsewhere on Google Play. Remember, just whistle and your Android will respond!
release_text: New in Whistle Android Finder PRO version 5.1: (*) Added ANDROID 5.1 Support!! (*) Extended Android platform support

description: AdyClock turns your phone into a digital desktop clock with several color themes and alarm. In one stroke, you can specify the alarm! Many options to set the alarm parameters! Can choose from several color themes. * 12/24 hours format. * Adjustable time going off the display. * Optionally, turn on the airplane mode during night-time display screen. * Sunrise, sunset and moon phases. * SINGLE TOUCH ALARM! - The alarm can be set via a single pull of the display. * Alarm dialog in the same style with LCD display. * Predefined alarm profiles. * User-configurable alarms. * Optional types of vibration. * Many features will be added in next versions. * Widget that displays the current time and alarm time. Required permits: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE Play music stored on your phone and SD card. RECEIVE_COMPLETED_BOOT After switching the phone is a need to re-start the alarm. WAKE_LOCK Allows you to keep the display lit regardless of the setting phone. READ_PHONE_STATE Determine whether a call is ongoing. Alarm clock waits for the call is finished. WRITE_SETTINGS Allows to work with system settings (such as switching airplane mode). COARSE_ACCESS_LOCATION, ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION Determining the position to view the sunrise and sunset. DISABLE_KEYGUARD Alarm dialog can be viewed through the lock screen.

description: אפליקציית OTO - חובה בכל אוטו - גרסת בטא, Beta Version חינם גלאי מכמונות מהירות אוטומטי אצלכם בטלפון ! כולל כל המכמונות החדשות ומתעדכן אוטומטית באופן קבוע האפליקציה מזהירה בחיווי קולי וויזואלי אם התקרבתם לאחת ממצלמות המהירות שבמאגר ואתם מעל המהירות המותרת. סעו בזהירות ומנעו התראות! אפליקציית OTO הינה אפליקציה ישראלית חדשה וחכמה במיוחד. היא "זוכרת" בעצמה (ללא צורך של כל התערבות שלכם) את המקום שבו חניתם ויודעת לכוון אתכם חזרה לרכבכם (במידה ולא חניתם בחניון תת קרקעי). האפליקציה מציגה שרות ייחודי אשר שומר על מיקום רכבכם בזמן החנייה באופן אוטומטי בשרת של אנגוג כך שתמיד תוכלו למצוא אותו. הערה: עדיין יש פספוסים של זיהוי מקום החניה. בקרוב נוציא update עם שיפורים. זוהי אפליקציה מגניבה בעברית שכדאי שתהיה במכשירכם, רק למקרה הצורך... בנוסף אפליקציית OTO מציעה את היכולות הייחודיות הבאות: -חניונים – מידע עדכני על חניונים, מחירים ומיקומם (כולל חניונים בחינם בתל אביב!, בקרוב בעוד ערים) -אזורי חניה – מפת אזורי החניה לפי תו אזורי ברחובות תל אביב -בתי קפה בתל אביב (בקרוב בעוד ערים) – האפליקציה מציגה בתי קפה מומלצים ומיוחדים שבחרנו במיוחד עבורכם תוכלו לנווט לחניון/בית קפה או כל נקודה אחרת על ידי לחיצה עליו ובחירת"Waze" המידע באפליקציה מתעדכן באופן קבוע. צפו לקבל גרסאות מעודכנות ותזכו למידע ויכולות אטרקטיביות נוספות. שימו לב!: אנא אפשרו את ה- GPS ואת אופציית "שימוש ברשת אלחוטית למציאת מיקום" לצורך הפעלת גלאי המצלמות ומציאת מיקום הרכב. מלבד זאת הפעלת ה- GPS האוטומטית עבור זיהוי המכמונות מותנית בכך שהטלפון מחובר למטען בכדי לא לבזבז סוללה. הערה חשובה: הגרסה הנוכחית הינה גרסת בטא של האפליקציה. אם נתקלתם בבעיה, או אם יש לכם הצעות לשיפורים – אל תהססו לפנות אלינו. בנוסף: במספר דגמים האפליקציה אינה עובדת. אנחנו מצטערים על כך ועובדים קשה בימים אלו על מנת לאפשר שימוש באפליקציה עבור דגמים אלו. בכל ענין אנא צרו קשר איתנו במייל info@anagog.com (תגיות: מכמונות מהירות, אפליקציות חדשות מגניבות, אפליקציה ישראלית, אפליקציה בעברית, חנייה בתל אביב, איפה הרכב, איפה חניתי, חניון, וייז, מפה, ניווט, בתי קפה, מומלץ, חינם, רגלי, חדש, מצלמות, משטרה, אוטומטי, חיישן waze, parking, find, car, automatic, sensors, map, israel, tel aviv, tlv, coffee, driver, speedcam, alert, navigate, new, cheap) Application OTO - a must in every car - Beta, Beta Version Free Auto radar detectors in your phone! Including any new cameras and automatically updated regularly The application warns voice and visual indication if Htkrbtm one speed cameras in the database and you are over the speed limit. Drive carefully and prevent alerts! Application OTO is a new Israeli application and smart. It "remembers" its own (without the need of your intervention) the place where you parked and knows how to direct you back to your car (if you parked in an underground garage). Application presents a unique service which keeps your car while parking location automatically on the server of Angog so you can always find it. Note: there are still Candid parking space detection. Besides running the automatic GPS for detection cameras conditioned phone is connected to a charger to not waste battery. Important note: The current version is a beta version of the application. If you encounter a problem, or if you have suggestions for improvements - do not hesitate to contact us. In addition: the number of models in the application does not work. description: Lisez investir soi-même en 30 minutes sur votre smartphone ou tablette avec cette appli gratuite ‘Apprendre la bourse’. Le cours ‘Apprendre la bourse’ convient parfaitement à la bourse pour les nuls et s’adresse aussi au traders expérimentés. Après avoir suivi le cours, vous pouvez aller trader en bourse en ligne dans les indices comme le CAC 40. Aucune connaissance préalable sur le trading n’est requise. Avec cette appli, vous apprenez à acheter des actions et vous pouvez trader avec le course de la bourse. Bref, ce cours ‘Apprendre la bourse’ s’adresse à tout qui s’intéresse aux investissements. Dans le cours ‘Apprendre la bourse’, vous apprenez à acheter des actions sur la bourse en ligne avec des petits montants à partir de 100 euros. On appelle cela aussi le trading CFD. Lors du trading CFD (Contract for Difference), deux parties (l’acheteur et le vendeur) concluent un contrat. On échange ici la différence entre le prix à l’ouverture et le prix à la clôture d’un contrat. CFD est un instrument de placement avec un effet de levier vous permettant, en tant qu’investisseur, de tirer un avantage financier, tant avec un cours en hausse, qu’avec un cours en baisse. Grâce au levier, vous pouvez acheter plus d’actions en bourse avec CFD qu’avec un investissement traditionnel. Par étape, vous trouvez un exemple pratique afin de pouvoir faire le lien clair entre la théorie et la pratique. De cette manière vous apprenez à comprendre la bourse. Le cours se base sur un cours en direct qui se tient avec des dizaines de participants. Le cours ‘Apprendre la bourse’ comporte les parties suivantes: Etape 1: Trader en général Etape 2: Négocier via un broker Etape 3: Faire des bénéfices avec le trading en ligne Etape 4: La gestion de vos risques Etape 5: Cas pratiques Etape 6: Commencer à négocier en ligne À la fin du cours, vous pouvez choisir parmi une série de brokers en ligne et commencer directement à placer de l’argent fictif ou réel en créant un compte gratuit. Ensuite, vous pouvez directement acheter des actions du CAC 40 par exemple. Read invest yourself in 30 minutes on your smartphone or tablet with this free app 'Learning scholarship. The course 'Learning scholarship' is perfect for the purse for Dummies and also for the experienced traders. After completing the course, you can go online stock trader in indices such as the CAC 40. No prior knowledge of trading is required. With this app, you learn how to buy stocks and you can trade with the race purse. In short, this course 'Learning Scholarship' is open to all who are interested in investments. In the course 'Learning scholarship', you learn how to buy stocks online trading with small amounts from 100 euros. This is called as CFD trading. When trading CFD (Contract for Difference), both parties (buyer and seller) enter into a contract. Here we exchange the difference between the opening price and the closing price of a contract. CFD is an investment instrument with a leverage allows you, as an investor, for financial gain, as with rising prices, with a falling prices. With leverage, you can buy more shares traded with CFD with a traditional investment. By step, you will find a practical example in order to make a clear link between theory and practice. In this way you learn to understand the stock market. The course is based on an online course which is held with dozens of participants. The course 'Learning grant' includes the following parts: Step 1: Trader in general Step 2: Negotiate through a broker Step 3: Make profits with online trading Step 4: Managing Your Risk Step 5: Case studies Step 6: Start Trading Online At the end of the course, you can choose from a number of online brokers and immediately start placing the fictitious or real money by creating a free account. Then you can directly buy shares in the CAC 40, for example.

A Vet Tool is the perfect app for veterinarians, vet technicians, anyone working in the veterinary field, veterinary students, or anyone that is just interested in more information about the drugs and tests used at a vet clinic. By downloading A Vet Tool you are getting five fully featured applications. The five applications are accessible through an easy to use tab based interface. - The first application is a complete small animal (cat and dog) drug formulary with over 650 drugs. The drugs can be accessed quickly with the android fast scroll or by using the search function. Each drugs lists the indications and appropriate drug dosages in a format perfectly suited for the Android Platform. When compared to the price of a printed pocket formulary this function alone makes A Vet Tool a great value! - The second application contains common blood value lab results for birds, cats, cattle, dogs, ferrets, guinea pigs, horses, and turtles. - The third application is a collection of x-ray comparisons such as a good knee versus an OA knee. - The fourth application contains nine calculators: • Math calculator with memory function, the memory is saved even when the app is exited. • Conversion calculator that performs common conversions that a veterinary professional must do on a daily basis. It includes weight units (Kg, gram, mg, μg, ounce, lb), liquid units (Liter, dL, mL, ounce, tsp, tbsp, cc) and temperature units (Fahrenheit, Celsius, Kelvin). • Age calculator which takes a birth date as the input and outputs the age in years, months, weeks, and days. • Gestation calculator which can calculate the estimated birth date of several different species. • Fluid rate calculator which can calculate the ml/hour for fluids. • Dosage calculator to calculate how much mg of a drug should be given based on the patient's weight. • Body surface area calculator for dogs and cats. • Energy Requirements calculator for dogs and cats. • Transfusion calculator to determine the volume of donor blood needed - The fifth application is a great notepad. Notes can be added, deleted, and edited at any time. A Vet Tool was created with the assistance of several veterinary professionals and will provide anyone in the veterinary field or interested in the veterinary field a great value for their Android Device.

description: This app shows you the best sales on the Play Store , Steam , PSN (Playstation Store), Xbox (360 and One), GOG (former Good Old Games) and Origin . You will see the Games Bundles (Humble Bundle, Indie Gala, Bundle stars, Indie royale) too . You will found all the sales of apps & games for your Android device, all the sales of the Steam store (for PC games and apps), for your Playstation devices on PSN (PS3, PS4, PSVita, PSP), for you Xbox devices (Xbox One or Xbox 360), the games on GOG or the games on the Origin platform (by Electronic Arts), and the Bundles of Games. You can filter the deals displayed based on the download count or by the percentage of reduction. By clicking on the developper's name, you can list all the apps from this developper. Price history The price history of the app is displayed, which tells you the price changes in the past, if the price had been lower, how long ago and at which price. Follow list / Watchlist You can manage a "follow" list to be notified when a specific app is on sale. It's like your wishlist. To follow an app from the Play Store, Steam, PSN, Xbox, GOG or Origin website, use the "share" button and select "best app sale" to open the page of this app on best app sale. You will find the follow button and the price history. You can also use the search function. Other functionalities - Sort by date of discount, popularity, discount, release date - You can choose the country (thus the currency) and the language of the store - You can see ended sales - Share the sales to your friends - Nearly all apps and game are available in best app sale ! All the best price cut, price reduction are available in the app. You will miss no deals, no game or app that is on sale. Best App Sale will be the best friend of your wallet, for the best app on sales but also for the best games on sale. If you would like to buy a package of multiple games for a really low price, the functionnality to list the bundles of games will let you buy multiples games for as low as 1$ (by example) !
release_text: Version 2.52 - Added Playstation Plus sales on PSN - Modified the url for PSN/playstation games Version 2.51 - Added the steam packages - Little improvement in description displaying in Android Version 2.50 - You now have a listing of games bundles (Humble Bundle, Indie Gala, Bundle stars, Indie royale) - Open automatically the keyboard when you star a search - For GOG, added countries: Brasil (in $), Japan (in $), Germany (in €) and German language - Bug fixes

A very simple to use Automatic Call Recorder app. Just install and forget. Each call whether incoming or outgoing will be recorded seamlessly. An intuitive interface ensures that the calls recorded are displayed in a list with inbuilt media player. The recordings can be setup automatically to be backed up using Dropbox. Features: 1. Auto recording incoming and outgoing calls 2. You can see call details for particular recorded calls 3. Enable/Disable auto call recording 4. Turn on/off notification while recording call 5. You can manage count of recording calls (Mange Inbox size) 6. You can change file type of call to be recorded 7. Mange black list that you want to ignore recording for particular contacts 8. Mange audio source 9. You can ignore all contacts OR can ignore black listed contacts for auto recording 10. Mange ignore contact list 11. Auto Sync with Dropbox Cloud Sync *Please note that recording might not work on some phones. This is a hardware limitation. On some phones it might only record the incoming voice and not outgoing voice.

description: All level Cyclists now have access to an exciting new Bicycle Gear Calculator application. A must have app for bike mechanics, commuters, road cyclists, mountain, cyclocross, BMX riders and racers. Every dedicated cyclist wants to be more powerful. Using a customizable bike gears calculator app makes it easy. Customize the bike gears calculator app to match your bike specs. Bike gears calculator allows you to choose cadence, tire size, crank length and more and determine gear ratio, gain ratio, speed, pedal rotations and much more. Bicycle Gears app helps you to determine whether you have the right bike but the wrong gears. This handy application gives cyclists facts on-the-spot to improve their overall experience. Bicycle gear calculator app is comprehensive get answers right away and share them with other cyclists. Create tables and view essential information at a glance: gear inches, gain ratio, development, speed and more. Ease of use makes this app the ultimate way to find solutions. When you get answers, share them with fellow cyclists. Choose time then let the Bike Gears app calculate the distance you will cover using a particular gear ratio and number of pedal rotations. Alternatively, you can also calculate time and distance based on the number of pedal rotations per a certain gear ratio. Plan your trips, know your gears and achieve your goals using this handy bicycle gear calculator app. You can even select the distance and the time and number of pedal rotations required. The application can help you to compare the gears and find the alternative gears. Bike gears app helps cyclists do it all. Bicycle gear calculator app is an easy way to get the facts. Cycling is better when you know how and when to get in the right gear. Getting in the optimum gear on time will improve your performance. Take advantage of the incredible abilities of this innovative app to meet and exceed your cycling goals. Have a safe ride!

Global tidal is a free mobile application for fishing, diving swimming enthusiasts, which provide the tidal data about anywhere on the sea. It could help you ensure the safety and enjoyment for your activities. Feature: Provide query and analysis of real-time tidal data anywhere on the sea , also includes tide graph, phrases of the moon, fishing condition prediction and other feature You can get real-time tide data at any time within the next year, and the historical data within a week before. You can directly search for the location by entering coordinates, you can also search the location by map. And the apps can locate quickly in order to get the tidal data about the place where you are. You can keep and manage your focusing places, and you can add notes to these places in order to facilitate the management. Offer registration and login function, you can synchronize your favorites to another device.

Jeux éducatifs (5) pour les enfants de 2 à 10 ans. Voix et textes en FRANCAIS. [Garantie sans virus et sans aucune publicité // Connexion à internet nécessaire pour charger les musiques et les consignes parlées / vous pouvez tester ce jeu dans sa version gratuite] >> Retrouvez "Barnabé", un petit chien courageux, dans son aventure et ses rencontres... La particularité de ce jeu est qu'il propose une véritable petite histoire, liée par 8 mini-jeux. L'enfant choisit s'il veut faire toute l'aventure, ou s'il veut juste jouer aux mini-jeux. Toutes les instructions sont orales (en français), et l'enfant est parfaitement autonome dans son jeu éducatif. Il y a 8 modes de jeux : - un jeu de calcul, lors duquel l'enfant devra aider Barnabé (le petit chien) à compter les oiseaux qui volent dans le ciel... - deux jeux de psychomotricité (coordination) dans lesquels l'enfant aidera Barnabé, à retrouver des petits marcassins et des bébés tortues, qui se sont perdus... - un jeu de répétition ; à la nuit tombée, Barnabé regarde les étoiles qui jouent de la musique... l'enfant devra reproduire les notes de musique en cliquant sur les bonnes étoiles... - deux jeux ludiques de coordination ; l'enfant devra guider Barnabé à sauter au bon moment par dessus des petits obstacles (fleurs, buissons, champignons...) jusqu'à la ligne d'arrivée... - un jeu de calcul et de coordination ; Barnabé aide un canard à attraper des pommes qui flottent sur la rivière, en faisant bien attention de ne pas attraper les poissons... - et un jeu de reconnaissance et d'identification, dans lequel l'enfant devra retrouver des fleurs particulières, dans un champ fleuri, pour composer un joli bouquet... Chaque mini-jeu évolue progressivement, et chaque victoire est encourageante pour l'enfant, accompagnée par des applaudissements, une musique et des "bravo !"... /* Si vous constatez un "bug", n'hésitez surtout pas à m'envoyer un mail : réponse assurée */ /* les mots d'encouragements sont aussi très très appréciés */ Pour l’anecdote, ce jeu a été réalisé pour ma fille de 3 ans et demi (très important, le "demi"). Et croyez-moi, ma fille est très "directe" (pour ne pas dire "sans pitié")... et je ne mets sur le Store que les jeux qui ont passé sa "validation"... Devant son succès, je l’ai mis sur le « Play Store ». Je suis sûr qu’il rendra vos enfants tout aussi heureux d’y jouer…

Toutes les instructions sont orales (en français), et l'enfant est parfaitement autonome dans son jeu éducatif. Il y a 8 modes de jeux : - un jeu de calcul, lors duquel l'enfant devra aider Barnabé (le petit chien) à compter les oiseaux qui volent dans le ciel... - deux jeux de psychomotricité (coordination) dans lesquels l'enfant aidera Barnabé, à retrouver des petits marcassins et des bébés tortues, qui se sont perdus... - un jeu de répétition ; à la nuit tombée, Barnabé regarde les étoiles qui jouent de la musique... l'enfant devra reproduire les notes de musique en cliquant sur les bonnes étoiles... - deux jeux ludiques de coordination ; l'enfant devra guider Barnabé à sauter au bon moment par dessus des petits obstacles (fleurs, buissons, champignons...) jusqu'à la ligne d'arrivée... - un jeu de calcul et de coordination ; Barnabé aide un canard à attraper des pommes qui flottent sur la rivière, en faisant bien attention de ne pas attraper les poissons... - et un jeu de reconnaissance et d'identification, dans lequel l'enfant devra retrouver des fleurs particulières, dans un champ fleuri, pour composer un joli bouquet... Chaque mini-jeu évolue progressivement, et chaque victoire est encourageante pour l'enfant, accompagnée par des applaudissements, une musique et des "bravo !"... /* Si vous constatez un "bug", n'hésitez surtout pas à m'envoyer un mail : réponse assurée */ /* les mots d'encouragements sont aussi très très appréciés */ Pour l’anecdote, ce jeu a été réalisé pour ma fille de 3 ans et demi (très important, le "demi"). Et croyez-moi, ma fille est très "directe" (pour ne pas dire "sans pitié")... et je ne mets sur le Store que les jeux qui ont passé sa "validation"... Devant son succès, je l’ai mis sur le « Play Store ». Je suis sûr qu’il rendra vos enfants tout aussi heureux d’y jouer…

Frozen Air Hockey is the first ever multi-device multiplayer Air Hockey game for the Android! You can purchase the paid version of the game to host multiplayer games and your friends can play against you for free! Additionally, you can play singleplayer against a challenging AI, and send feedback and feature suggestions from inside the app itself. Upcoming features: - Desktop version for testing multiplayer against yourself or with friends. - Reworked physics engine. - Tweaking speeds, friction, and physics response. - Integrating input for multi-touch devices (for same-device multiplayer) - Increasing performance for slower devices. - Implementing popular suggestions sent from the 'Feedback' section of the game. Troubleshooting - I can't see other devices on the network. Make sure you are on the same WiFi connection and your host is using the paid version of the game. Restart the app and enter the games list around the same time. If all else fails, some wireless access points do not implement IPv4 multicast which is required for networked play. - The game crashes on my device or is really slow! I'm working hard to support as many devices as I can. Please send me a report from the 'Feedback' section of the game or e-mail me. - Anything else Shoot me an e-mail from the 'Feedback' section of the game. I'll do my best to support you.

[Jeu d'aventure - polar interactif en français / Garanti sans virus et sans publicité / il s'agit de la version gratuite et limitée du jeu - la version complète coûte seulement 2,25 euros] >> Si vous rencontrez un soucis avec le jeu (aide dans l'aventure ou soucis technique) : merci de contacter le support : mercure-co@live.fr // les demandes dans les évaluations du jeu ne sont pas prioritaires, car nous ne les traitons que ponctuellement. >> SYNOPSIS Après avoir arrêté un caïd de la mafia, Frederic Hunter, officier de police, doit se mettre au vert dans le village de son enfance... Mais dès son arrivée, il apprend la découverte du corps d'une jeune fille, Laura, au bord de la rivière. L'aventure commence : examinez le corps de la victime, parcourez le village, interrogez ses habitants... et tentez de découvrir ce qui est arrivé à la pauvre Laura : suicide, accident, ou meurtre ?... Au fil de l'enquête, l'aventure prend un tournant des plus mystérieux. Quelles sont ces lumières dans la forêt ? Pourquoi le corps de Laura semble présenter des radiations inconnues ? Que fait la DRM (services secrets de l'armée) au village ? Est-ce que la mafia va retrouver Frederic Hunter ?... Autant d'énigmes qu'il vous faudra résoudre pour comprendre ce qui se trame dans cet étrange village... >> /!\ RECOMMANDATIONS Le jeu est un polar interactif... Sans être violent, le contenu peut s'avérer de nature à choquer un public sensible ou jeune. Il est strictement déconseillé aux enfants (-18 ans) et aux personnes fragiles. >> /!\ IMPORTANT Le jeu contient énormément de contenus multimédia (+400Mo). Afin de ne pas surcharger les tablettes à faible capacité, le jeu n'installe pas les images de fonds, les musiques et les vidéos. Il les télécharge en direct sur un serveur, sans jamais les stocker. Le jeu ne pèse donc pas plus de 27mo. Chaque image doit mettre moins d'une seconde pour apparaître [entre instantanément et 0,75sec, dans des conditions normales]. Les premières images peuvent être plus longues (quelques secondes), mais tout rentre dans l'ordre petit à petit... Les images et leur chargement sont optimisés. Les musiques et bruitages sont pré-chargées dès le lancement du jeu. Quant à la vidéo, elle est chargée en streaming (en direct). >> Si malgré tous les efforts déployés pour optimiser les chargements, vous constatez des ralentissements, vérifiez que vous n'êtes pas trop loin de votre signal Wifi, qu'il n'est pas parasité, ou que votre réseau n'est pas saturé (téléchargement, multi-connexion)... La saturation de la mémoire peut occasionner des "plantages". Pour régler ce soucis, sauvegarder, quitter (complètement) le jeu, et charger votre partie. Cette procédure purge complètement la mémoire. Dans le cas contraire, merci d'envoyer un "Message" au support du jeu mercure-co@live.fr [Adventure Game - Interactive fiction in French / Guaranteed virus free and without advertising / he is the free limited version of the game - the full version costs only 2.25 euros] >> If you encounter problems with the game (with the adventure or technical problem): thank you contact support: mercure-co@live.fr / / requests in the ratings of the game are not a priority, because we not treat them only occasionally. Jeux éducatifs pour apprendre l'alphabet en douceur. Voix et textes en français. [Garantie sans virus et sans aucune publicité / vous pouvez tester ce jeu dans sa version gratuite] Jeux éducatifs pour apprendre à reconnaître les lettres de l'alphabet. Ce jeu, destiné aux enfants à partir de 2 ans, a la particularité de rendre l'enfant complètement autonome dans son apprentissage, même s'il ne sait pas lire, car il est uniquement réalisé à partir de symboles simples, et les instructions sont lues clairement (nécessité d’avoir du son). Ce jeu éducatif est entièrement en français (textes et voix). Il y a trois modes de jeux : - un jeu qui invite l'enfant à reconnaître la première lettre d'un animal ("A comme Abeille") - un jeu pour apprendre, facilement, à reconnaître une lettre parmi d'autres - un jeu pour apprendre à reconnaître une lettre parmi de nombreuses autres. Une musique très douce accompagne l’enfant dans son exercice, et à chaque fois qu’il trouve, il est encouragé dans ses efforts par des applaudissements et des "bravo". L’interface a été spécialement conçue pour les enfants. Le style graphique est doux et coloré, et propose une animation de plusieurs "scrollings" pour adoucir l’exercice. Les lettres se détachent de l’écran de manière beaucoup plus vive pour être bien identifiables par l'enfant. Ce jeu permettra à votre enfant d’apprendre, tout en s’amusant, à décrypter les lettres de l’alphabet, à les prononcer, à identifier les animaux (abécédaire)... et surtout, il passera un très agréable moment. Pour l’anecdote, ce jeu a été réalisé pour ma fille de 3 ans… Devant son succès, je l’ai mis sur le « Play Store ». Je suis sûr qu’il rendra vos enfants tout aussi heureux d’y jouer… Educational games to learn the alphabet smoothly. Voices and texts in French. [Warranty virus free and no advertising / you can test the game in its free version] Educational games to learn to recognize the letters of the alphabet. This game, for children from 2 years, has the distinction of making the child completely autonomous in their learning, even if he can not read because it is only made from simple symbols, and instructions are read clearly (need sound). This educational game is entirely in French (text and voice). There are three game modes: - A game that invites the child to recognize the first letter of an animal ("A Bee as") - A game to learn, easy to recognize a letter among other - A game to learn to recognize a letter among many others. A very soft music accompanies the child in the exercise, and every time it finds, it is encouraged in its efforts with applause and "Bravo". The interface has been specifically designed for children. The graphic style is sweet and colorful, and offers several animation "scrolling" to soften the year. The letters stand for the screen so much more vivid to be easily identified by the child. This game will help your child to learn while having fun, to decipher the letters of the alphabet, to pronounce, to identify animals (ABC) ... and most importantly, he spent a very pleasant time. For the record, this game was made for my 3 year old daughter ... of its success, I put on the "Play Store". I'm sure your children will be just as happy to play it ...

description: It’s summer vacation! Are you going on holiday with your family? You can go by car, train, bus or by airplane! In this game you are the stewardess who need to clean the airplane before the next flight. First you can do the indoor of the private jet. It’s a real mess in this plane can you help the stewardess to clean it up? There are 3 levels in this clean game for girls. ✔the indoor of the jet ✔ the cockpit ✔ the outdoor of the plane The visitors and the pilots made a big mess of the airplane when they were flying to their vacation destiny and now you can clean up the rubbish. You begin with cleaning up the indoor of the airplane. Do the mess in the dustbin and place the good things back where they belong. You also need to vacuuming and to dust the room. When you are ready with the indoor you go further with the cockpit. Also the pilot made a mess of the cockpit of his plane and stewardess cleans it up. Help her with the vacuum cleaner, window washing and throw the rubbish away. The pilots will be very happy with a clean cockpit and shiny windows! The last thing you need to do is washing the outdoor of the plane. During the flight the plane has become dirty. Wash and polish the airplane and give it the color you like and you can also choose a nice design. Do you like games to clean up the house but want something different? This game is the right game for you! This kids cleaning game is a nice variation. Features of free airplane flight clean up: ❀ clean up game for girls, kids and toddlers ❀ easy to play ❀ with three levels ❀ summer holiday style Do your kids love cleaning games? Then they will like this game! Special for the summer holiday we designed this airplane flight clean up game. Airplane flight clean up is a game from Top Girl games and one of the best clean up game for kids and toddlers, we publish many different easy to play girl game apps. We hope you will enjoy our Airplane flight clean up and we hope you give us the love by liking our Facebook page or follow us on twitter. So we can keep you up to date on our girl games, dressup, spa salon and cleaning up games. ♥ Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/LadiesDressUp ♥ Twitter - https://twitter.com/ladiesdressup

My Color Guide guives you access to thousands of colors and palettes (including Sherwin-Winlliams, and RAL pallettes). Share the colors and their hex code with your clients and friends by email. This application helps you keep an inventory and wish list of colors that you can browse anytime. You can also use My Color Guide with the camera on your phone to tell you the names of colors in real-time and save them into custom palettes. Must have app for graphic designers, painters, artists, illustrators and color lovers alike! Features: • Capture a color from your phone camera and match it to one of thousand available colors. • Modify Contrast, Saturation, Brightness and Hue of Camera Stream • Create a custom palette. • Search for specific colors or browse the full RAL, Sherwin-Williams and custom color palettes. • Save colors to your custom palettes to compare palettes or share with friends and family via email. • Learn color names, RGB values, and hexadecimal numbers. • Available in 6 different languages (English, German, French, Spanish, Netherlands and Italian) Due to technical limitations, colors seen within the application may not accurately reflect real colors. We are actively adding new features to this app, so please send us feedback to emmanuel.garnier.dev@gmail.com . We read every email!

Multiplication Hero is one of the best math games for free! Train your brain and math skills with this game! Solve math tasks and get to the highscore. The rules are simple: You will get different multiplication tasks. To solve them, click on one of the four presented solutions at the bottom of the screen. Only one solution is correct. For every correct answer you will get a point. If the answer is wrong a point will be subtracted. You have 200 seconds for the game! Multiplication Hero is an addicting math game for those that like to play games online for free. It is a great educational game for kids and students. If you like other puzzles and number games you will love Multiplication Hero - one of the best math games for Android!

OpenConnect is an SSL VPN client for Cisco AnyConnect and ocserv gateways. FEATURES - One-click connection (batch mode) - Supports RSA SecurID and TOTP software tokens - Keepalive feature to prevent unnecessary disconnections - Compatible with ARMv7, x86, and MIPS devices - No root required - 100% open source (GPLv2+); 100% free; no ads - Based on the popular OpenConnect Linux package REQUIREMENTS - An account on a suitable VPN server - Android 4.0 (ICS) or higher (with working VpnService + tun infrastructure) XDA thread and FAQ: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2616121 Source code: https://github.com/cernekee/ics-openconnect Please do not use the reviews to request features or report issues, as they do not provide a suitable forum for support. Please post your question in the XDA thread, file a bug report in the Github project, or email me directly at cernekee+oc@gmail.com .

description: Defend the planet against a shower of asteroids in this retro style arcade game. Your job is to blast as many asteroids as you can out of the sky. They start out slow, but don't let that fool you. They'll begin to get faster and come at you from different directions as you try to dodge them. Try not to let too many get past you or you'll lose points. Just touch the sides of the screen to move left or right and the gun shoots automatically.

app_name: Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids
description: It's time for bed and you've run out of ideas for lulling your baby to sleep? Try playing 'Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids' on your Android™ phone and you'll be surprised to see your children doze off in a few minutes! We collected best “nursery rhymes” for kids especially for you and your little ones. You will enjoy soothing songs and relaxing sounds as your child enters the land of sweet dreams. Download best lullaby music for your baby sleep today and experience the bliss of a calm and peaceful parent. Good night and enjoy your healthy dreaming! ★Songs for kids on your mobile phone! ★Perfect sound to sleep to! ★Set time interval or let it sing constantly until your children fall asleep! ★These beautiful baby lullabies will help your child sleep like an angel! ★'How do I get a baby to sleep' is a question that will never pop in your mind again! ★These cute nursery songs are followed by beautiful backgrounds! Are you in desperate need of music for insomnia? 'Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids' is an amazing and most effective Android™ application that you can use at bedtime. Resting is crucial to your child's health and well-being. These “children songs” and lullaby music for babies will stay in your kids' memory throughout the entire life. Surprise them with these nursery lullabies - this is also a nice opportunity for your children to start learning nursery rhyme lyrics. Provide your kids with good quality baby music, wish them a goodnight and relax as long as you like! Get these songs for toddlers today and see for yourself! Your baby can't remain quiet? Crying can be their way of asking to be held close. Newborns sleep a lot – typically up to 16 to 17 hours a day. But most babies don't stay asleep for more than two to four hours at a time, day or night, during the first few weeks of life. The result? Lots of sleep for baby and a very irregular – and tiring – schedule for you. Your job is to respond to your newborn's cues, so you'll probably be up several times during the night to change, feed, and comfort him. Free lullabies can only help! 'Cute Bear Relax Sound for Kids' is here, waiting for you to download it! Singing soothing lullabies and other children songs is a time-tested way to help a sleepy infant drift off. Your little one loves hearing her favorite sound — your voice — and the soft, infant music may calm her. Playing a CD or tape of music for toddlers, sleeping music, or other music for kids while you settle your newborn to sleep — and then leaving it on at low volume after you leave — can help ease the transition from being awake to falling asleep. A sound machine may soothe her, too, with the added benefit of drowning out outside noise. Legal info: ===== This is a free application. Songs are originally designated to lull a child and they are believed to be in a public domain. If you are an author of a song or you are aware that copyright belongs to a commercial author, please report to us immediately. Thank you!

* OffNav is an android (>= 2.1) based moving map application intended for offline marine and land navigation. * Maps are created by the user and loaded on SD card (see user manual). * Neither Wifi nor mobile network connection are needed for map presentation. * Points of interest (named way-points) can be added by the user based on GPS fix, WGS84 lat/long coordinates (in marine mode), tapping on map, street addressing (in land mode) or be loaded from a text file. * Anchor (marine mode) and proximity (land and marine modes) alarms can be set for each waypoint. * Track can be saved to a file in both marine and land modes. * Turn-by-turn navigation including audio instruction is available in land mode (Wifi or network connection are needed to download route instructions). * A compass screen presents heading and bearing to way-point information, in addition to other navigational data, in both graphical and textual formats. The user manual can be downloaded from ftp site: ftp://ftp.offnav.com user: anonymous@offnav.com password: not required go to data folder

description: Solitair / Patience The purpose of patience generally involves manipulating a layout of cards with a goal of sorting them in some manner. However it is possible to play the same games competitively (often a head to head race) and cooperatively. Patience games typically involve dealing cards from a shuffled deck into a prescribed arrangement on a tabletop, from which the player attempts to reorder the deck by suit and rank through a series of moves transferring cards from one place to another under prescribed restrictions. Some games allow for the reshuffling of the deck(s), and/or the placement of cards into new or "empty" locations. In the most familiar, general form of Patience, the object of the game is to build up four blocks of cards going from ace to king in each suit, taking cards from the layout if they appear on the table.

Playing sliding puzzle and Sudoku are both ways to enhance cognitive ability. Improve memory, cognitive abilities, brain health and attention, with scientific brain game, get higher IQ. Sudoku is number-placement puzzle. Play Sudoku daily free. Sudoku is a fun game and great for brain fitness. Other names: sodoku, sudoko, suduku, sodoko, sudoku. Be careful Sudoku is an addictive game. Sudoku means single number. Suuji, which can be translated as the digits must be single. Each Sudoku has a unique solution that can be reached logically without guessing. Enter digits from 1 to 9 into the blank spaces. Every row must contain one of each digit. So must every column, as must every 3x3 square. Does a Sudoku have more than one solution? Properly formed Sudoku always have only one solution. In our view, a Sudoku with more than one solution is not properly formed, but of course puzzles from other sources may have multiple answers. SUDOKU The grading is based on the logic steps required to solve the puzzle. The requirement to use any of a number of pre-defined logic steps makes a puzzle hard, and needing "hard" logic more than a few times makes a puzzle very hard. Of course, difficulty is subjective. One person may find a particular type of logic easy, while another finds it really difficult. There are often only a relatively small number of "choke" points in even a very hard puzzle. If you happen to spot the "hard" steps quickly, then you'll fly through! Sudoku kills time. Sudoku = brain power Sudoku on android phone. There are many SUDOKU apps but, we want to be your SUDOKU app sudoku puzzles with difficulty levels ranging from easy to evil SUDOKU has tons of options to make your game play more enjoyable. Sudoku should be a fun game so before leaving a negative comment please email your concerns with my sudoku game. A lot of the comments that are left about my SUDOKU game are just misunderstandings about the uses of the options available on the main screen. I would love to have my sudoku game on your phone so please help me be the best sudoku game on the market. Please share this sudoku game with others and help spread the work.
