So please, try our free version Androrec (v1.9 or greater) from play store (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.androglobe.androrec) before buying this one. If Androrec does not work for your phone, then please do not buy Androrec+. Call recording is not legal in some countries. Please respect the law of your land if you belong to such a country. Features -------------- New : Users can now restrict call recording by defining Blacklist and Whitelist from settings and also can change the theme to dark or light. ► One tap Enable/Disable call recording. ► Option to select a custom location to keep the recording files ► Records all incoming and outgoing calls without limits. ► Can record in amr or mp4 or 3gp format (Configurable). ► Log of the recorded calls can be viewed from the application which includes the details of the call like contact number/name, exact date time as well as duration of the call making it easy to track all your calls from the application. ► The logs can be filtered by contact, date, duration or direction (Incoming/Outgoing). ► Recordings can be played, deleted or archived from the application itself. ► Recordings can be sent via email, dropbox or any similar applications from the application. ► Option to delete, archive or send multiple recordings simultaneously. ► Option to hide notification during call recording. ► Option to show notification with transparent icons which will enable long call recording and also hide the recording icon by using transparent icon. ► Option to hide the recordings from default media player list. ► Option to show pop up after the call to keep or discard the recording. ► Option to keep deleted recordings in trash folder for few days (configurable number of days) before actually deleting the record to avoid accidental delete. ► No Network access needed ► Enable/Disable recording based on blacklist/whitelist ► Change application theme Notes: ---------- There is some issue in call recording with KitKat release. Please try the free version before using the Androrec+. Please share any issues faced with the current release of Androrec+ as this is a major update. Do not rate us badly without providing a chance to correct the issue. Either uninstall or disable call recording in any other call recording applications installed in your phone including Androrec (free version) before using Androrec plus All the recordings will bydefault be stored in your primary SD card in androrec folder. The location can be changed from the settings. All previous recordings from Androrec (free) will also be available in Androrec plus log even if the free version is uninstalled. Note : Please do not rate bad, if you have bought Androrec Plus without trying Androrec free version (Version 1.9 or greater). For any issues please write us to care@yorkerapps.com . We will try our best to resolve your issue. search-tags : call recorders, two way call recorders, call recorders for android, call recorder, best call recorder

description: Pokaż co potrafi Twój umysł! Woggle PL już dostępne w pełnej wersji darmowej! Woggle to uzależniająca gra słowna zainspirowana grą planszową Boggle. Zadaniem gracza jest znalezienie jak największej liczby słów w ciągu trzech minut. Im dłuższy wyraz tym więcej punktów! Cechy gry: - Ponad 3 miliony słów w słowniku! - Unikalny tryb gry dla dwóch graczy na jednym urządzeniu - kto pierwszy ten lepszy! - Wygodne zaznaczanie wyrazów poprzez przejeżdżenie po literach bez potrzeby ponownego klikania (swipe). - Płynne działanie dzięki efektywnej optymalizacji kodu źródłowego. - Intuicyjny interfejs. - Tabela wyników. - Opcjonalne efekty dźwiękowe. - Gra zoptymalizowana do wszystkich wielkości ekranów, łącznie z tabletami. Zapraszamy do polubienia naszej strony na facebook'u: https://www.facebook.com/wogglepl Zachęcamy do nadsyłania nam pomysłów na dalszy rozwój aplikacji oraz zgłaszania ewentualnych problemów na nasz oficjalny mail lub poprzez profil na facebook'u. Zasady gry: - Słowo musi składać się przynajmniej z trzech liter. - Każdą literę można wykorzystać przy tworzeniu danego słowa tylko raz. - Łączone litery muszą przylegać do siebie bokami lub rogami. See what you can do your mind! Woggle UK now available in the full version free! Woggle is an addictive word game inspired by the board game Boggle. The player's task is to find as many words in three minutes. The longer the word the more points! Game Features: - More than three million words in the dictionary! - Unique game mode for two players on one device - first come first served! - Convenient selection of words by Pass the letters without having to re-click (swipe). - Smooth operation through effective optimization of the source code. - Intuitive interface. - Results Table. - Optional sound effects. - Game optimized for all screen sizes, including tablets. We invite you to like our page on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wogglepl We encourage you to send us ideas for further development of the applications and reporting any problems on our official mail or through a profile on facebook. Rules of the game: - The word must consist of at least three letters. - Each letter can be used when creating a word only once. - Finger Letters must be adjacent to each other sides or corners.

description: Elements Chainz combines the fun of three like puzzle games with the additional original fourth elements possible combinations. Not enough? Add a special fifth element called "Ether". Still not enough? Add three game modes : - CHRONO MODE 3min time limit small games for casual players, can be played under the shower or in the toilets. - CHALLENGE MODE With impossible board puzzles, unreacheable score goals and annoying combos challenges. - SURVIVAL MODE Test your torture endurance, reach insane scores and prevent your board to be full of uncombinable elements. * THE GAME Elements Chainz is a variant of the "game of three" where you have tiles on a board and have to combine each tiles three by three or more to remove them from the board. Then new tiles comes and here you are, trying to achieve insane combination and amazing scores. I loved that "genre" since the incredible Tetris(TM) and addictive Bejeweled (TM). Elements Chainz revisit and enhance the concept by adding more fun and complexity to the tiles and their combinations and by having games modes that push the genre to its limit. * ELEMENTS The 4 elements in Elements Chainz are the very classical "Earth", "Fire", "Water" and "Tree" (or Flower) plus an additional element called "Ether". Each elements exists in three levels from the lowest to the highest : "Stone", "Wood" and "Metal". * GAME MODES Elements Chainz offers three game modes. Before challenging any of the mode, you need to complete the tutorial (the game buttons will be slightly translucent and desactivated until then). -> CHRONO MODE In this mode, you have 3 min to beat your current highscore and attempt to reach one of the top position of the leaderboard of the game. This mode starts with an empty board and a stack that displays the next elements you'll be able to put on the board. Each time an element is put on the board, the game add another randomly choosed element (which is not displayed in the stack!). -> CHALLENGE MODE In this mode, you have 3 min to solve a puzzle or complete a goal. Here's the list of challenges : First Row : Score challenges Second Row : Combos challenges Third Row : Puzzle challenges -> SURVIVAL MODE There is no time limit in the survival mode but the game will immediately end when the board is full. So be extremely careful when you place your tiles and/or anticipate any combination before, as new tiles absolutely need more space that what is available (the additional tile from the game is still applied). * SUPPORT The game mechanics are described here : http://www.bnto.net/elements/index.html For questions, issues, bug reports and comments, it's also here : http://www.bnto.net/elements/index.html And if you want to talk about what you would like to see in this game, new modes, new challenges : email me.
release_text: - New Challenges - Bug fixes - Better Performances - Added some new and more beautiful gfx

This collection of Toddler Games is ad free and works on mobile and tablet devices. Please contact me @ agladkowskidev@gmail.com for any feedback and support! description: How to play -Initially you will see all cards turned face down. Tap on one of the card and remember the picture on it. With the next tap try to find and flip the card with the same picture as previous one. If the pictures on the both memory cards will be the same, they will stay opened and you can continue with the next pair. Otherwise both cards will flip back over and you will get another try. Try to find all matched cards as fast as possible. 　 - Find Alphabet can also be used as the best educational tools to help children. Help training and observation of the child's brain, cognitive, concentration, memory, creativity and imagination to improve. Reaction speed and coordination of the brain and hand. Exercise visual ability to observe the dynamic objects. Main Features - 3 different difficulty (kid: 3x2; easy: 4x3; normal: 5x4; hard: 6x4; other: 3x2 -> 9x6) - Language support: English, French, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, ... Communication - Alphabet memory game is a game for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children and teens. description: ** Please note, all features related to ephemeris are available only as part of the in-app purchases . Please do not give it a bad rating simply because the cool features are not free. We worked very hard to create this app so please support it if you find it useful ** This is a special call to landscape photographers, travel photographers, nature photographers or those who are especially interested in night photography, skyline, time-lapse, star-trail and milky way or astrophotography: look no more, this is the ultimate app for you - the PlanIt! More video tutorials at http://youtu.be/CrtWDHNlwPA?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbeu8Yx4paLUytV8z60SSL_w *********** If you are interested in an iOS version, you can find it at https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/planit!-for-photographers/id898876435 . If you would like to try our beta program, please join the Google+ community where we will share what we are working on to you before releasing it to public. A lot of features and enhancements are in the pipeline. https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/112054339546694455211 ************ Ansel Adams dedicates the beginning of his first book "Taos Pueblo" to visualization. He introduced the idea of "previsualization", which involved the photographer imagining what he wanted his final print to look like before he even took the shot. Of course there are many great photos which were taken impromptu. However, for landscape photographers, being able to previsualize the scene before going there will greatly reduce the chance of being caught unprepared and will greatly increase the chance of getting better shots. Photographers use various tools to help them pre-visualizing the scene. Nowadays, many of those tools are phone apps. PlanIt! is all-in-one solution that is designed to leverage the map and simulated viewfinder technologies (VR, AR etc.) to provide the necessary tools for photographers to pre-visualize the scene in combination with the Sun, Moon, Stars and Milky Way. Some questions that you might ask yourself before going out for a photographing trip are: * Where is the Sun or the Moon at the time and the location and to see the animation of the Sun/Moon/Stars/Milky Way movements as in real? * When and which azimuth is the Sunset or Sunrise today or on any date at any location around the world? * Do I get a clear view of subject from a certain location where is no mountain blocking the view? * What lens should I bring in order to capture the whole width or the height of the scene? * If the scene is too wide, how many shots do I need to take to create a panorama and how many angle should each shot cover and how many angle should I rotate the camera between each shot? * How do I compose the scene considering the subject’s elevation and the sun or moon location? * Is tonight a good time for star trail photography? How long can I exposure without being affected the rising moon? * What are the dates and times to have Milky Way at certain position on the sky? If you are interested in the answers of any questions above, the PlanIt! is the right app for you. In a simple app, we included Tools feature for you which allow you to find out GPS coordinates, elevation, distance, elevation gain, direct view, focal length, depth of field (DoF), hyperfocal distance and panorama, and all of those are represented to you visually on the map and sometimes in a simulated viewfinder. In addition, the Ephemeris features include the sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset time and location, twilights, special hours of the day, position of the Sun and the Moon, Sun/Moon Finder, more than 100 stars (such as Polaris) azimuth and elevation angle, star trail planning and exposure time calculation, time-lapse and hyperlapse calculation, milky way searching, exposure/ND calculator, light meter, bub timer etc. Again, all of them are either represented on the map or in the viewfinder. Please refer to http://yingwentech.wordpress.com/tags/planit for more details.

description: This is the official mobile app of the Buffalo Bills. Make your Android device a unique part of your game-day experience for Bills games. Want to catch breaking news of the team? See real-time statistics for every drive? Watch video-on-demand clips of press conferences and player interviews? Follow post-game blogs and pre-game previews of the matchups? Now, you can stay in touch with the Bills anytime, anywhere, on your Android device. FEATURES include: - News: Real-time breaking news from the Bills, previews of upcoming matchups, post-game blogs - Video: Video-on-demand clips of Bills' press conferences, coach and player interviews - Photos: Gallery of game-time action - Audio: Podcasts - Stats: Real-time statistics and scores from the official NFL stats engine, head-to-head stats of the matchup, player stats, drive-by-drive stats, box score, out-of-town scores around the league - Standings: Division and conference standings - Fantasy: Keep track of your favorite fantasy players - Depth chart: Shown by offense, defense and special team - Social media: Official Bills Twitter feed, check in to the stadium on game-day, one-click tweet of all media items, one-click Facebook posting of all media items - Digital keepsake: Your game-time moment superimposed on the stadium jumbotron in the form of a unique digital keepsake - Schedule: Schedule of upcoming games, and scores/stats of previous games from the season, ticket purchase for games - Concessions: Interactive map of the stadium with searchable concessions-stands and amenities - Problem-reporting: Reports of various problems and issues around the stadium - Evolving home-screen: Pre-game, in-game, post-game, off-season countdown, draft-day Follow us @buffalobills on Twitter for updates or visit www.buffalobills.com. FEEDBACK/QUESTIONS; Email support@yinzcam.com or send a tweet to @yinzcam The official Buffalo Bills Mobile app is created and maintained by YinzCam, Inc., on behalf of the Buffalo Bills.

description: Plow, plant, water and harvest in Yipy Garden Farm! In Yipy Garden Farm your little farmer will grow all kinds of veggies and fruits for their very own animal customers! Kids can cultivate and harvest over 10 different fruits, veggies and flowers in Yipy Garden Farm, combining fun with clear educational values. Yipy Garden Farm familiarises kids with the process of planting and growing different vegetables and fruits. In total 12 mini games gives kids a creative, educational and entertaining time. Great learning value for kids and parents alike while having fun! KEY FEATURES ✔ More than 30 different steps including digging, plowing, sowing, watering and harvesting ✔ Includes educational games to take care of the environment ✔ 8 funny animal customers ✔ 10 different vegetables, flowers and fruits ✔ Beautiful original artwork All YiPY YiPY games have the following educational values and policy: ✔ No rules or stress – play any way you want to! ✔ Intuitive, safe and kid-friendly interface ✔ No scoring or time pressure, which creates a relaxing environment to stimulate creativity and learning ✔ Kid safe ✔ No third-party advertising ✔ No in-app purchases This all contributes to make our brand YiPY YiPY and its products trusted by parents. ABOUT YiPY YiPY YiPY YiPY was born in Scandinavia by an Australian-Swedish-German Team which creates kids games with educational values that get kids familiar with life and the world around them. http://www.yipyyipy.com All of our games contain educational values which we believe should go beyond the alphabet and math. We feel games should teach kids about life and the world in a broader, deeper way. We want parents to know their children are safe while playing YiPY YiPY games and that they are learning and spending their time in a positive way Privacy Policy As a designer of kids games, we understand how important privacy is in this modern, digital world. You can read our privacy policy here: http://www.yipyyipy.com/privacy
release_text: This update contains 4 NEW mini games like making a pizza, a fruit juice and toast with eggs. Now there are in total 16 great mini games in YIPY Garden Farm to play.

description: В новой версии мы собираемся сделать топографические карты, поэтому просим вас заполнить простую форму в которой указать какой местности вам нужна топокарта: http://twmap.ru/topo/maps/request/ Вам нужны карты России, но там где они вам нужны нет интернета(или он дорогой) и вас бюджетный смартфон - тогда это приложение для вас. Данная версия приложения заточено на работу совершенно на всех устройствах: без GPS, Wifi и компаса. Но первый раз интернет вам все-таки понадобится, так что сразу после установки я рекомендую скачать нужные вам карты. Это сделать просто - запустить приложение и выбрать раздел Управление картами. В разделе Управление картами найдите нужную область России и кликните по ней и начнется скачивание выбранной карты, немного подождите чтоб карта загрузилась и распаковалась (у карты в списке появится значок "Есть"). Все карты которые у вас "есть" вы можете выбрать для просмотра - кликом. Для того чтобы смотреть карты зайдите в раздел "Карта" и вы окажетесь в центре выбранной ранее карты. Пользуйтесь на здоровье. В приложение нет поддержки GPS сделано для того чтоб можно было использовать на устройствах без GPS. В дальнейшем мы обязательно выпустим версию с поддержкой GPS и прочих "наворотов". Карты в формате mapforge 3. Данные карт OpenStreetMap.org. Права на данные карт принадлежат участникам OpenStreetMap.org. Разрешения: Неограниченный доступ в интернет (android.permission.INTERNET) - для того чтоб получать список доступных карт из сети. Просматривать состояние сети (android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE) - для быстрого определения есть ли подключение к сети. Я конечно мог бы не использовать его, но тогда пришлось бы дольше ждать показа списка карт. Отключать спящий режим (android.permission.WAKE_LOCK) - для того чтобы уменьшить количество глюков в процессе скачивания и распаковки карт. Запись во внешние хранилище (android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE и android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) - для того чтобы хранить карты на SD карте. Отключение функции блокировки экрана (android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD) для того чтобы не блокировать экран при отображении карты In the new version, we're going to do topographic maps, so we ask you to fill out a simple form in which to specify which areas you need a topographic map: http://twmap.ru/topo/maps/request/ Need maps of Russia, but where you need them no internet (or it is expensive) and you have a budget smartphone - then this app is for you. This version of the application is ground to work perfectly on all devices: no GPS, Wifi and a compass. But the first time online you still need, so that immediately after installation, I recommend that you download the desired card. This is done simply - run the application and then select Manage cards. In the Management section maps locate the region of Russia and click on it and will download the selected card, wait for the card to download and uncompress (the card icon appears in the list of "Do"). All cards that you "have" you can choose to view - click. In order to look at the cards go to "Map" and you will find yourself in the middle of the previously chosen card. Use of health. In the application there is no GPS support are made to be used on devices without GPS. In the future we will release a version with support for GPS and other "bells and whistles". Format maps mapforge 3. These cards OpenStreetMap.org. Rights to these cards belong to the participants OpenStreetMap.org.   Permissions: Unlimited internet access (android.permission.INTERNET) - In order to receive a list of available maps of the network. View network state (android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE) - to quickly determine whether there is a connection to the network. I certainly would not use it, but then would have to wait longer display a list of cards. Disable sleep mode (android.permission.WAKE_LOCK) - to reduce the number of bugs in the process of downloading and unpacking cards. Writing to the external storage (android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE and android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) - to store maps on the SD card. Disable the screen lock (android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD) in order not to lock the screen when the map

description: EasyMatch is a memory game. The rule is very simple: turn the cards and find out the matched shapes. There are four different modes, Beginner(3x4), Easy(4x4), Normal(4x5) and Hard(5x6). Challenge your memory, to earn the higher score with fewer turns and less time

Sweet Cup is a classic link up puzzle game with cute cup pictures. The rule is very simple: connect two same cups to eliminate them. Try your best to eliminate all cups as quickly as possible and 3-star score can help you earn the props. There are 4 modes, each mode has 24 levels to wait your challenge.

The Sesame Street: Divorce app provides parents and caregivers with tools to help children ages 2-8 cope with the many transitions related to divorce or separation. Features include: - Articles with tips and strategies - Videos featuring real families and Sesame Street’s Abby Cadabby - Conversation Starters providing age-appropriate language - Interactive Tools such as the Face Maker and Coloring Pages to use with your children - Additional support and educational resources We recommend you use the tools and watch the videos before sharing them with your children so that you can choose what is most relevant and helpful for your family. Resources in this app are part of Sesame Street’s “Little Children, Big Challenges: Divorce” initiative. You can access other Sesame Street divorce materials online, at sesamestreet.org/divorce.

description: AlertMap - VIEW and POST geo-tagged messages, pics, and video from and about the M 9.0 earthquake and tsunami, East Coast of Japan. AlertMap is a free real-time GLOBAL messaging app that allows users to easily share information, for everyone in the world to see. It is helpful for those in affected areas of Japan to have access to real-time data, whether it is pictures of damage or unidentified people. By helping with the flow of real-time information, we hope AlertMap will help in the effort, and provide a new and efficient means of communication when traditional channels are stressed or lacking. Interestingly, the earthquake was preceded by a series of large foreshocks in the previous two days, beginning on March 9 with a nearby M 7.2 event, followed by three other M>6 foreshocks before the M 9.0 occurred on March 11. Please send suggestions to admin@yodalab.com . Let's help each other. Gambaro!

description: BMI calculator - Free(ad-supported) Body Mass Index (BMI) calculator app. (NOTE: An ad-free but paid version of this popular BMI calculator app is available, so if you're not OK with ads and want to purchase it, please search the android market by entering "BMI Calculator Pro Youdroid" it has the same logo at this one and is also from YouDroid). ✓ This BMI Calculator is Free ✓ It supports both English and Metric measurement units. ✓ It computes BMI for children and teens, aged 2 through 19 years old, including Z-Score, percentile, result. ✓ BMI for adults, 20 years old and older, including healthy weight range. ✓ Measurements can be saved (for privacy sake, all data is saved locally on your phone and nowhere else!) and browsed back (Menu -> History). ✓ Multi users is supported ( Menu -> Add User). A user can be added/edited/deleted. This is, for instance, useful and handy for families for their children and professionals. ✓ Healthy weight and BMI ranges. *** For privacy sake, all your data/information is saved locally on your phone and nowhere else. *** You have to add a new user if you want to save his/her results and avoid re-entering all needed info each time you want to calculate his/her BMI. You can browse this user's history. *** Use the "Default User" if you want to enter height, weight, sex, birth-date,.. each time to calculate BMI. This is useful if you want to calculate BMI of random people without having to create a new user or needing to save their results. ** Please tell us what you think/want by rating and reviewing this app on Android Market. We value your opinion. ( Menu -> Rate us) Thank you for being patient :) ✓ What customers say: "Bmi calculator This ap is very complete and seems to be very accurate. And it's free!" "Excellent So far I'm very very pleased with this app works great on my droid x" "Works like it's supposed to. And the history tracker is a great motivator!" "Simple but Powerful Great user experience with straightforward instructions. Clear and systematic history view."

AIG Mobile Guard Keep your mobile phone safe and sound AIG Mobile Guard is part of your mobile insurance with AIG. As soon as you activate it on your phone, you're covered against loss or theft. With AIG Mobile Guard, you can... • Back up your mobile address book and transfer your contacts to a new or replacement phone • Lock your phone from your computer if it's missing or stolen. Once it's locked, it can't be used without you unlocking it, even if the SIM is changed. • Track down your lost phone by setting off an alarm and checking where it is on a map. • If your phone's lost or stolen, first lock it with AIG Mobile Guard and then call AIG and they'll block the SIM card for you. That way, no one can put your SIM in another phone and use it to make calls. Keywords: Mobile Security, Mobile Protection, Missing Cellphone, Antivirus, Antivirus For Android, Phone Lock, Free Security Apps, Security Lock, Security Alarm, Malware Protection, Privacy Guard, Antitheft Alarm, Find My Phone, Phone Finder, GPS Tracker, Back Up.

description: Mobile Superhero is the ultimate protection for your Android device. In a world of ever increasing device theft, be comforted in the knowledge that Mobile Superhero will secure your Android device and data if it is ever lost or stolen. Mobile Superhero allows you to lock, locate and recover your Android device. Using your secure online vault, you can also backup your contacts in the event of loss or theft. ---------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------- Features: • Lock o Lock your Android device remotely from your secure online vault or lock your Android device by SMS from another phone and we'll send your missing device location back to that phone. o Sound an alarm to deter a thief from keeping your Android device. o Wipe your personal data from your Android device from your secure online vault. o Captured Pictures are uploaded to your secure online vault when locked to allow you to see who is using your phone. o Even when your device is locked, our software will still allow you to call your device. o The device is allowed to make Emergency calls even when locked. • Intelligent Locking o Locks your Android device automatically if the SIM is changed. o Locks your Android device automatically after a period of inactivity. o Locks your Android device automatically if calls are made to phone numbers that are not stored in your contacts. • Locate o Locate your Android device with GPS accuracy, WiFi or Cell ID and see the location of your Android device using Google Maps and Google Street View. o If an SMS lock is sent from another device to your Android device, the device from which the SMS was sent will receive an SMS with your Android device location. • Contact Backup & Restore o Backup your contacts from your Android device to your secure online vault. o Restore your contacts from your secure online vault to another device. • Recover o Mobile Superhero has built in functionality that will allow a Good Samaritan to report your found Android device to the Yougetitback Recovery team. o The Yougetitback loss recovery team are available 24/7/365 to help you get your Android device back. ---------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------- Need Support? Contact our support team http://www.yougetitback.com/support Check out our website www.yougetitback.com for more information. Take a look at a demonstration of the secure online vault: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9NBg1sA9LAY Don’t forget to follow us: Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Yougetitbackcom/115930428442391 Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/yougetitback/ ---------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------- About Yougetitback: Yougetitback.com, a global company, based in Ireland that develops solutions to give peace of mind to mobile device users, has developed Mobile Superhero. We combat the problem of protecting and recovering lost and stolen mobile devices by offering a fully scalable global solution that includes smartphone software, tablet software and laptop software combined with a powerful recovery service.

Sonic Circle is dedicated to Thurston Moore of Sonic Youth. The Isle is Full of Noises CALIBAN Be not afeard. The isle is full of noises, Sounds and sweet airs that give delight and hurt not. Sometimes a thousand twangling instruments Will hum about mine ears, and sometime voices That, if I then had waked after long sleep, Will make me sleep again; and then, in dreaming, The clouds methought would open, and show riches Ready to drop upon me, that when I waked, I cried to dream again. William Shakespeare’s The Tempest 3.2.148-156

description: ID3Fixer can help to fix garbled ID3 tags of music. Support two mode. 1. Fix tags in music files permanently.(Suggested) 2. Fix Android database only, does not affect the music files. ID3Fixer support multi-select and fix a batch of files. ID3Fixer can read the ID3/WMA/MP4 tags(artist name, album name, song's title, etc..) with the charset you assigned, and you can preview the results before apply to prevent wrong operation. Support to select music by folder. If you found some songs that could not be fixed, please send the sample file to me, and I will try to fix it, thanks. ID3Fixer support ID3v1, ID3v2, MP4 and WMA tag. p.s. If the method to write tags does not work, and no error message pop out, maybe your device does not support to reading Unicode tags. Currently support charset: English, Chinese Traditional, Chinese Simplified, Japanese, Korean, Eastern European, Cyrillic, Western European, Greek, Turkish, Hebrew, Arabic, Baltic, Vietnamese, South European, Thai, Russian, Unicode. If you need any charset that does not in the list, please email me or left the message in the comment, I will add it in the next release. Add Hebrew translations, thanks aviel ghermezian and his team. Support multilingual, English, Chinese Simplified, Chinese Traditional, Hebrew. Tag: id3, tag, music, mp3, mp4, wma, covert to unicode.
release_text: 4.0.9 - Fix folder name issue if browsing to root folder 4.0.8 - Fix some crash issues on special device 4.0.0 Major release. - All new UI - Wizard mode, more easy to use - Support to edit all tags in Wizard mode - Support all audio types (include mp3, mp4, wma, etc..)

description: The process of teaching kids the abstract concept of numbers involves teaching them the symbols for digits and teaching them to say and recognize spoken numbers. This is an easy to learn game for preschoolers that will reward them when correctly saying the numbers they find in hidden objects. The easy and intuitive learning section where toddlers can listen how each number is pronounced and then practice saying those numbers out loud to clear a board full of digits, prepares them for the interactive treasure-hunt levels where they can prove their pronunciation of numbers they find on rich cartoonish maps. The game uses speech recognition and innovative gameplay to both talk to kids and listen to what they answer, then evaluates their language skills and progress in learning the numbers. App features: • Intuitive way of teaching kids to say the digits using spoken instructions • Recognize when kids correctly say a digit and reward hem for their patience • Fun, educational, creative and simple to play • Multiple languages supported • Safe play environment without ads, pop-ups or in-app purchases Say My Numbers is an excellent early learning game for young children. Discover the magical world or numbers, reimagined for today’s creative kids! Needs a stable Internet connection and Google Voice Search installed About Croco Studio:  Croco Studio is an award-winning team of parent developers intent on creating apps that kids adore and parents trust. Our apps provide a safe playing environment and we create apps that encourage kids to learn the fun way. Please contact us with feedback at WeListen@crocostudio.com . We’d love to hear from you.
release_text: • New levels and updated gameplay • Improved graphics and speech recognition performance • Fixed bug introduced with and update to Google Voice Search in Android 4.4 that makes language switch on the fly impossible. If the language switch button is disabled, please update your device’s software to Android 5.0 or later. If this is not possible, please exit the game, change the device’s language and restart the game that will now run in the language of the system. • Other minor bug fixes

description: Undead vs Plants is a new cool ricochet shooter game free to download. Not all undead are stupid undeads, this undead smasher uses ricochet kills to end with nasty plants! The rules for this free undead game are simple – aim and fire and hope the bullets will go your way! The bullets bounce off everywhere, try using as less as possible to finish with the bloody monster plants in this extremely fun arcade shooting game! This is a real plants war against undeads – if you are stupid, plants will end you! You guys should prove you aren't stupid undeads, and be the smartest undead with a good strategy that can kill all the plants and save your ammo! This bullet hell game is easy-to-handle but hard to master ! This addicting game full with plants on a undead farm has 150 levels, all of which are special in their own way, and on every one of them, you can win 1, 2 or 3 stars. Try solving the puzzle of monster plants and passing all the levels with max number of stars! But beware, ammo is limited. You will need to be cagey and clever in order to be successful in this physics simulation game. Believe us, it's a tricky puzzle game, and every time you involve in solving the level, you will be brain training! This shoot 'em up immerses you in the crazy undead versus plants world where your goal is to shoot those bloody monsters plants! Ricochet kills is the only thing that can destroy these ragdoll plants – aim the right angle, and use your bullets wisely. Using different helps and upgrades will be very helpful in your adventure! This shooter game offers: Smack Attack when your undead gets stuck on any level, Ammo Revival when you shoot all of the bullets and bloody monster plants are still alive; Shoot and travel through different plants and undeads' worlds – from blurry caves to sunny beaches and wild jungles. If you love physics game and are in the mood for some serious gun shooting fun then this addicting game of ricochet is great for you. This HD fun game of undead versus plants will offer an intense experience for hardcore gamers, yet remaining accessible to new casual gamers. Don't be stupid – come & play Undead vs Plants now for a great experience! ** Undead vs Plants offers tablet optimized UI and gameplay. Download and play this fun undead game on any Android phone and tablet and enjoy HD graphics and sounds. This free game is intellectual property of PeakselGames – copyright 2015

description: This is a turn based strategy game with >200 maps, it is not pretty, no fancy animations, this is pure gameplay oriented turn based strategy. FORUM opened for the game! (check it in the game or here: http://www.androidutils.com/forum/) ! Includes - 170 Campaign maps (historical ones too! eg: Battle of Troy and so on) - 40 random maps - more than 80 unit types - more than 25 technologies to invent - multiplayer game (with option to coop against AI-s) - rewarding systems: collecting stars, collecting gems for unlocking new unit/building types JOIN the playing of the MULTIPLAYER MODE! It is fully functional! UNIT REQUESTS: there are many requests for new units and unique units (eg. historical heroes), I am pretty open to this since it is pretty easy to setup a new unit. Please join the forum and put there the idea and i will make it! If u install it - be kind with the rating, since this app is in the middle of growing - feel free to send me any suggestions on any part of the game (gameplay, units, unit-properties, new unit suggestions, graphics) - If u would like to take part in creating this game (eg. graphics, translation, ideas) send me an email. What to do: 1. Create a game (select map, set colors, players, teams) 1.1. OR start a Campaign 1.2 OR play MULTIPLAYER 2. play it 5. send me suggestions. Have fun!

description: Eco Bicycle – Cycling Tracker is a GPS tracker that tracks the most important aspects of your bike ride, including total time, distance, total change in altitude, current speed, maximum speed, and average speed. Unlike other GPS Trackers, Eco Bicycle – Cycling Tracker tracks your bike ride in a battery friendly way, and gives you control to choose between accuracy and battery life. Have a long bike race planned? You’ll want to set the app to maximum battery life. Going on a pedal around the block? Set the app to full accuracy. Something in between? Pick somewhere in the middle! All cyclers love the following features that make Eco Bicycle – Cycling Tracker a quality free app: - It is possible to choose between accuracy and longer battery life. - We do not use unnecessary functions in order to save a maximum of battery life. - We always have a great level of accuracy as our main target. - Our cycling app is of universal use – no matter if you’re in a race for USA Cycling or USCF, or just peddling around the block. - Our app stores your history, so if you’re training for a USA Cycling race, you can track your progress over time. Eco Bicycle – Cycling Tracker is simple to use. Upon launching the app, the Eco Bicycle is ready to go as soon as the GPS icon changes to green. The GPS search begins after pressing the Play button, to save a maximum of battery life. Stopping for a break? Press the pause button. All done for the day, press the stop button and your cycling session will be logged in the Track History log. Eco Bicycle – Cycling Tracker also tracks these aspects of your biking: TOTAL TIME: The total time of your biking. DISTANCE: How far you biked. ALTITUDE: Changes in your elevation. If you go up a 10 meter hill and back down a 10 meter hill, the app notes that you traversed 20 meters of elevation. CURRENT SPEED: How fast you’re biking. MAXIMUM SPEED: The fastest speed you achieved during your biking. AVERAGE SPEED: The average speed over the course of your biking. The Eco Bicycle – Cycling Tracker Menu allows you to change the following settings: SETTING: Accuracy versus Battery Life and switch between metric and non metric unit system TRACK HISTORY: Load stats from each of your previous bike rides. Elements like average speed are great for comparing over time, as they’ll show you how much you are improving as a cyclist! Download our cycling app now and save a lot of battery life during your bike ride. This app is perfect for those training for various races for USA Cycling, USCF, or US Pro. For questions or comments please send us a message. Check out our other eco apps: Eco Runner: Run Tracker ecoSkitracker - Skiing Tracker Keywords : bike, biking, biker, cycling, bicycle, bicycling, echelon, panniers, pedal, USA Cycling, USCF, USPRO, velodrome, gps tracker, cycling tracker, bike tracker

description: Get up-to-date schedules and trip plans for Berlin's public transport system. It's simple and intuitive, pick your departure and arrival stations and get a list of the next best connections to your destination. Contents: - information on connecting service - display of departures - purchase of mobile tickets - map with nearby stops, stations and car2go rentals - public transport network maps - display stations nearby with the support of Augmented Reality BVG FahrInfo Plus Berlin is the journey planner and mobile ticket shop published by the Berliner Verkehrsbetriebe (BVG) for the Transportation Association Berlin-Brandenburg (VBB) in the tariff zones Berlin AB, BC and ABC. The app includes all means of transport within the Transportation Association Berlin-Brandenburg (VBB), including Underground and S-Bahn, Tram, Bus and Ferry as well as regional trains. Setting the departure and destination will show the next journeys to your destination and appropriate mobile tickets ready for purchase. For Berlin, tariff areas are defined and divided into tariff zone A, B, and C. Tariff zone A covers Berlin's inner city up to and including the urban rail ring. Tariff zone B covers the area outside the urban rail ring up to the city boundary. Whereas tariff zone C includes Greater Berlin (area approx. 15 km around the State of Berlin), including the City of Potsdam. Mobile tickets are available for the tariff zones AB, BC and ABC. BVG FahrInfo Plus Berlin contains the following features: * Purchase of mobile tickets, payable by credit card or direct debit for the tariff zones Berlin AB, BC and ABC. - Short-trip ticket (Kurzstrecke) (reduced and bicycle fare are also available) - Single ticket (Einzelfahrausweis) (reduced and bicycle fare are also available) - Extension ticket (Anschlussfahrausweis) - Day ticket (Tageskarte) (reduced and bicycle fare are also available) - Small group day ticket (Kleingruppen-Tageskarte) (for up to 5 people) - Berlin WelcomeCard (for 48 hours, 72 hours, Museum Island and 5 days) - Berlin CityTourCard (for 48 hours, 72 hours and 5 days) * Journey planner * Display of departures * Additional settings - Save favorite journeys - Alerts on upcoming departures or connections - Choose a contact as the destination of your journey (optional) * Map of surrounding stops and stations including the locations of available car2go carsharing vehicles * Scalable network maps (offline) You need a connection to the internet to use features like the journey planner, departure board and mobile ticket shop. You can access a purchased and downloaded ticket at any time without connection to the internet.
release_text: * Realtime departure data for BVG * Earlier/later buttons in the journey planner * Station maps in the journey planner * Simplified mobile shop registration * Edit your personal data directly from within the app * Reset your password directly from within the app * Network maps Potsdam * Carriage of bicycle option in the journey planner * Various bugfixes

description: Listen to hardcoreradio.nl whole the day with Hardcore Radio. Angerfist, Outblast, Randy, Virus Factory, Endymion, Nosferatu, Bass-D or Serial Killaz.

The route planner for public transport With DB Navigator the Deutsche Bahn AG offers you the most comprehensive information service for your journey by ICE, IC, by regional transport, by underground train, bus and tram. The DB Navigator provides access to the timetables of more than 250,000 stops and stations in Germany and Europe - all up-to-date and in real time. With the new DB Navigator, the mobile services of Deutsche Bahn are now combined in one single app. Stay informed, book an manage your tickets in a comfortable way in DB Navigator. Your privacy is important to us. The use of the DB Navigator requires the following permissions: Your location: To use your current location als start/destination or to determin stops nearby. Calendar access: To save connection Information in the calendar. The app will not read other calendar entries. Read contacts: To select an adress from your adressbook. The registered address of your selected contact is transferred to the start/destination and used for the connection request. The permissions are used exclusively within the mobile device for the purposes described. If you do not want to use these comfort features, you can deactivate them with the new feature in the DB Navigator settings menu.
release_text: - Free seating reservation When buying a normal or special price tickets a seat reservation for all 1st class customer is inlusive .Stay flexible with unique , free exchange of reservation until shortly before departure. - Reasons of delay: The DB Navigator now shows detailed information about the cause of a possible delay. - The crashes on devices with display size of 6.3 to 7 inches ( Galaxy Mega, Ultra Xperia Z ) has been fixed

description: Alle Züge auf einen Blick: Mit dem DB Zugradar Verfolgen Sie die Züge des DB Nah- und Fernverkehrs live im DB Zugradar und grenzen Sie durch den Filter die Darstellung der Verkehrsmittel (Fernverkehr (ICE und IC/EC), Nahverkehr) und Bahnhöfe ein. Der DB Zugradar stellt auf einer dynamischen Karte das gesamte Streckennetz der Deutschen Bahn dar. Mit dem DB Zugradar können Sie das aktuelle Betriebsgeschehen aller DB-Züge auf einen Blick verfolgen. Damit wird Ihnen beispielsweise die aktuelle Situation einer ausgewählten Zugfahrt schnell und einfach visualisiert und die Pünktlichkeitslage in Echtzeit angezeigt. Wichtige Hinweise zur Darstellung: Die Zugpositionen werden auf Basis von Prognosen berechnet. Es werden keine Positionsdaten verwendet (GPS). Dies kann zu kleineren Unschärfen in der Darstellung auf der Karte führen. All supplied at a glance: The DB Zugradar Trace the course of the DB local and long distance traffic in the live DB Zugradar and borders through the filter, the representation of transport (long-distance transport (ICE and IC / EC), local transport) and Stations. The DB Zugradar presents on a dynamic map of the entire route network of the Deutsche Bahn dar. With the DB Zugradar you will find markings follow the current operating events of all DB-fed at a glance. To make the example, the current situation of a ausgewählten schedule quickly visualized and the Pünktlichkeitslage in real time. Important notes on presentation: The slide positions are calculated on the basis of forecasts. No position data used (GPS). This can lead to smaller blurred in the representation on the map.

Die S-Bahn App. Verbindet alles, was Sie wissen müssen. Die S-Bahn-App vereint eine komfortable Fahrplanauskunft (inkl. Echtzeitdaten, Fußwegrouting, Stadtplan) mit den wichtigsten S-Bahn-Informationen (Fahrplanänderungen, aktuelle Betriebsstörungen, Bahnhofsinfos) und eine Vielzahl von nützlichen Kontakt- oder Telefondaten für unterwegs (bis hin zur WC-Suche). Inhalte: +++ Fahrplanauskunft +++ - Verbindungsauskunft inkl. von Haustür zu Haustür - Fußwegsuche mit Darstellung in Umgebungskarte - Echtzeit-Abfahrtszeiten (inkl. Verspätungen) und Alternativrouten - Umgebungskarte mit Haltestellen und Abfahrtszeiten - Interaktives Liniennetz - Standortbestimmung - Wegeweisung via Augmented Reality +++ S-Bahn-Inhalte +++ - Fahrplanänderungen und aktuelle Betriebsstörungen inkl. Twittermeldungen - Bahnhofsinfos inkl. P+R, WC, Verkaufsstellen u.v.m. - Verfügbarkeit von Aufzügen und Fahrtreppen - Ticketinformationen inkl. Mitnahmeregelungen - Aktuelle Informationen rund um die S-Bahn +++ Ausflugstipps +++ - Exklusive mehrstündige Ausflugstouren von und zu S-Bahnhöfen - Rabattangebote für S-Bahn-Stammkunden +++ Hilfen für Unterwegs +++ - Notruf-/Hotline-Nummern mit Direktwahl - Hilfe bei Wertsachenverlust, Automatenstörung, Fahrscheinkontrolle u.v.m. - WC-Suche Die App benötigt folgende Berechtigungen: + Ihr Standort: Um als Start/Ziel "Aktuelle Position" zu verwenden bzw. Haltestellen in der Umgebung zu ermitteln. + Kontaktdaten lesen: Um als Start/Ziel möglichst einfach eine Adresse aus Ihren Kontakten übernehmen zu können. The S-Bahn App. Combines everything you need to know. The S-Bahn App combines a comfortable timetable (including real-time data, pedestrian routing, map) with the main suburban railway information (schedule changes, current operational disturbances, Station information) and a variety of useful contact or phone data for travel (up to WC-search). Contents: + + + + + + Timetable information - Connection information including door-to-door - Walk search with representation in Map - Real-time departure times (including delays) and alternative routes - Map, stops and departure times - Interactive line network - Placement Test - Way transfer via Augmented Reality + + + S-Bahn-content + + + - Schedule changes and current operating incidents and Twitter messages - Station info including P + R, WC, retail outlets etc. - Availability of elevators and escalators - Ticket information including driving regulations - Current information about the S-Bahn + + + Excursions + + + - Exclusive more hour excursion tours to and from train stations - Discount rates for S-Bahn regular customers + + + + + + Aids for the Road - Notruf-/Hotline-Nummern with direct dial - Help with valuable loss, machine malfunction, ticket control, etc. - WC-Search The app requires the following permissions: + Your position: To use as start / finish "Current position" or to determine stops in the area. + Read contact data: To qualify as start / finish as simple as possible to be able to select an address from your contacts.

description: Emulator for the popular 80's home computer C64. Can be controller via touchscreen, trackball, keyboard and/or external USB/bluetooth controller. Offers an on-screen keyboard for text input. Comes with some Public Domain games, f.e. Elite, Kickstart oder Attack of the Mutant Camels, ready to play! Other games can be added to the SD card and played from there. The emulator is not the fastest, so that a fast CPU is recommended for running it smoothly. The permission to write to SD card is required in order to be able to save changes to .d64 files.
release_text: -zipped C64 images now need to contain the original file type in their filename, e.g. mygame.d64.zip instead of mygame.zip, or they won't get recognized by the emulator

description: A jump & run game mixing elements of classic games like Super Mario World with elements from recent mobile games like Flappy Bird. Guide Jeremy with his jetpack through the tunnels of his underground gardens, where he can gather flowers for his beloved girl. Keep your finger on the screen to gain height with the jetpack, lift it from the screen to lose height, always avoiding collisions with the tunnel walls. The game has 50 levels of increasing difficulty. It uses global leaderboards where you can compare your highscore to that of other players, and allows challenge games (requires Android 2.3 or higher). In addition to the touchscreen controls the game can also be controlled external Bluetooth/USB controllers, trackball or keyboard. The game is MOGA Enhanced and also runs on the Nvidia Shield. Integrated with Immersion MOTIV Haptic Effects. Ad-supported version. App permissions required for ad retrieval.
release_text: -Challenge games can now be started via the normal level selection -Challenge games can only be started when at least one level got finished -bug fixes

description: A set of utilities for the Rolemaster (TM) Fantasy Roleplaying game. Currently implemented are: - a simple dice roller: rolls a d10, d100, d1000 and d100-openended on the press of a button - treasure generation: Enter the monster's treasure code(s) and with one button press the program rolls what loot the monster leaves. It uses the RMSS/RMFRP rules for treasure generation from Treasure Companion. Not all tables are yet coded into the program, but it should usually do more than 90% of the dice rolling involved and leave only small parts to the GM. The app displays ads and thus requires some permissions. If you don't like apps with ads, just don't download it. If you like the app, please rate it. If you don't like it, please tell me where I can improve it.
release_text: -removed the requirement for the ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION and READ_PHONE_STATE permissions -bug fixes

podKatcher is an Android app to easily find and play downloadable media offerings distributed in form of podcasts. Find millions of free downloads: mp3s and videos in form of podcasts. Hassle free downloads without rss feeds or URLs. Just start this free app and start downloading. Use this free podcast downloader to subscribe to podcasts on your Android device. It´s simple, good looking and free. No need to copy and paste urls of rss feeds. You can follow podcasts by clicking a star or using a gesture. Features of this podcatcher + download shows for offline usage or listen/watch with on demand streaming + full shownotes for all shows including HTML and images + podcast charts with podcasts in your language + podcast search in 175,000+ podcasts (channels) + browse podcasts by category (slider bar) + one click subscriptions + podcast subscription sync across devices and platforms + OPML export from within the podcast app + easy sharing including Google Plus support + fast login with Google and Facebook + swiping and gestures support + Seamless integration with Google Play Music or your favorite media player (like VLC or MX Player) + up to 50.000 new shows every day + up to 250 new podcasts every day + video thumbnails and embedded cover art Best podcast downloader This Podcatcher Android App is carefully tested on popular devices but due to the nature of Android some manufacture specific changes might cause trouble. Please report problems to help us make the best podcast downloader on the market! Podcast collections in your language Download free audiobooks from Librivox, podcasts from BBC, CNN, ABC radio and thousands other radio stations from the U.S. and around the world (Europe incl. U.K., Italy, Spain, Asia incl. Japan, China, Korea, South America incl. Chile, Brazil, Argentina) onto your device. We feature podcasts not only in English or German but also Spanish, Italian, French Japanese, Chinese, Korean and most other languages. Free Android podcatcher podKatcher is the official podcast software of www.podcast.name and podcast.de It´s free as in beer! So download this podcast app for Android now!

description: Das bietet die kostenlose Android-App von wetter.de: - Wetter für über 2 Millionen Orte weltweit - 15 Tage Vorhersage für Deutschland - 6 Tage Vorhersage für Europa und weltweit - Temperatur & gefühlte Temperatur - Regenmenge & -wahrscheinlichkeit - Sonnenauf- & -untergang, Sonnenstunden - Windstärke & -richtung - Unwetterwarnungen - Pollenflug - Wetter-Widget Das aktuelle Wetter für Ihren Standort Für alle, die es genauer wissen wollen, bietet die App von wetter.de nicht nur Temperatur und Regenwahrscheinlichkeit, sondern auch genaue Angaben zum Zeitpunkt des Sonnenauf- und Sonnenuntergangs sowie zur Anzahl der Sonnenstunden pro Tag. Auch für Allergiker haben wir das passende Wetter: Der Pollenflug gibt an, wie stark Sie am jeweiligen Tag betroffen sind. Unwetterwarnungen für jeden Ort in Deutschland Leider ist das Wetter in Deutschland nicht immer sommerlich. Wolken, Regen und Gewitter stehen oft auf der Tagesordnung. Dabei zeigt unsere Wetter-App, wo mit Unwetter oder Starkregen zu rechnen ist. Reisewetter für Urlauber Lassen Sie sich das Urlaubswetter für Ihren nächsten Ferienort schon vorab anzeigen und packen Sie Ihren Koffer passend nach der Wettervorhersage und prognostizierten Temperaturen. Ihre liebsten Orte in der Favoritenliste Speichern Sie zum Beispiel Wohn- und Arbeitsort oder Ihren nächsten Ferienort in der Wetter-App. Durch Hin- und Herwischen wechseln Sie zwischen Ihren Favoriten ganz einfach und können jederzeit neue hinzufügen oder alte löschen. Zusätzlich: interessante und kurzweilige Videos rund um das Thema Wetter. Haben Sie Feedback zur App? Wir freuen uns auf Ihre E-Mail an appstore@rtl.de . Nutzen Sie auch unser umfangreiches Angebot auf www.wetter.de! Hinweise zu den Berechtigungen: Bei der Installation der wetter.de-App geben Sie uns Zugriff auf verschiedene Bereiche Ihres Smartphones. Gerne möchten wir Ihnen kurz erläutern, wofür diese Daten benötigt werden. - Standort: Ermittlung Ihres Standortes für passende Wettervorhersagen - Fotos/ Medien / Dateien: Konfiguration und Wetterdaten auf dem Gerät speichern und vom Gerät lesen - WLAN-Verbindungsinformationen: Daten aus dem Internet laden - Geräte-ID & Anrufinformationen: Display-Vermarktung - Sonstige (Zugriff auf alle Netzwerke, Netzwerkverbindungen abrufen): Daten aus dem Internet laden This offers the free Android app from wetter.de: - Weather for over 2 million locations worldwide - 15 days forecast for Germany - 6 Day Forecast for Europe and worldwide - Temperature & wind chill temperature - Rainfall & verisimilitude - Sunrise & Sunset, sun hours - Wind speed & direction - Severe weather warnings - Pollen - Weather widget The current weather conditions for your location For those who want to know more, the app offers from wetter.de not only temperature and rainfall probability but also accurate information at the time of sunrise and sunset as well as the number of hours of sunshine per day. For allergy sufferers we have the perfect weather: The pollen indicates how strongly you are affected on that day. Severe weather warnings for each location in Germany Unfortunately, the weather in Germany is not always summer. Clouds, rain and thunderstorms are often on the agenda. It shows our weather app, where is expected to storm or heavy rain. Travel Weather for Tourists Let the holiday weather for your next holiday show in advance and keep your bags that match the weather forecast and predicted temperatures. Your favorite places favorites list Save as home and work or your next holiday in the Weather app. By way Herwischen you switch easily between your favorite and can always add new or delete old ones. Additional: interesting and entertaining videos on the subject of weather. Have feedback about the app? We look forward to your e-mail to appstore@rtl.de . Take advantage of our extensive range of www.wetter.de!   Information about the permissions: During the installation of wetter.de app you give us access to different areas of your smartphone. We would like to explain briefly what these data are needed. - Location: determine your GPS location for suitable weather forecasts - Photos / media / files: save configuration and weather data on the device and read from the device Load data from the internet wireless connection information - - Device ID & Call Information: Display Marketing - Other (access to all networks, network connections, retrieve): load data from the internet
release_text: - komplett überarbeitete App und Widget - 15 Tage Vorhersage für Deutschland - 6 Tage Vorhersage für Europa und weltweit - Über 2 Millionen Orte weltweit

description: Call Memo Add-On for Note Everything. Use this Add-On to easily create call memos with Note Everything. You choose a call from your call log to create a note or let the app automatically offer call memos after every call. You can configure the app if it should automatically offer to create memos after every call. Additionally you can set on which calls and in which time the app should react on calls. Also you can create your own template how the call memos should look like. THIS IS AN ADD-ON, YOU NEED TO HAVE "Note Everything" INSTALLED.

Wetter DE – das aktuellste Wetter für Deutschland Mit einem Tastendruck zu allen wichtigen Wetterinformationen. Punktgenaue Daten und Prognosen für jeden Ort in Deutschland, inklusive vielen nützlichen Spezialwetterbereichen.“ „Wetter DE – eine der besten Apps in Kategorie Wetter für Deutschland!!!“ Möchtest Du nur einen kurzen Überblick über das aktuelle Wetter, wissen – ob es bei Deiner Grillparty heute Abend trocken bleibt, eine Prognose für die nächsten Tage - oder lieber doch ausgiebige Informationen über das Biowetter oder Dein nächstes Reiseziel? Mit der Wetter Deutschland App bist Du immer top-informiert, egal wo Du Dich befindest! HOME: Nach dem Start hast Du sofort alle wichtigen Wetterdaten zu Deinem aktuellen Standort auf einen Blick. Zusätzlich kannst Du Dir punktgenaue Wetterinformationen und detaillierte Prognosen für Heute, Morgen - oder die nächsten 6 Tage ansehen. FAVORITEN: Füge die für Dich wichtigen Orte hinzu um immer schnell über die aktuelle Wetterlage in Deinen Lieblingsorten informiert zu sein. SUCHE/GPS: Wenn Du wissen möchtest wie das Wetter an einem bestimmten Ort in Deutschland oder auf der Welt ist, gib ihn einfach in der Suche ein. Noch einfacher ist es, über die eingebaute GPS-Funktion Wetterinformationen für Deinen aktuellen Standort zu erhalten. DEUTSCHLAND: Hier findest Du alle Wetterdaten aus ganz Deutschland. Informationen über das aktuelle Wetter, Prognosen, Temperaturen und Windwerte, aber auch Vorhersagefilme für Regen, Wind und vieles mehr. MEHR: Interessierst Du Dich für das Badewetter oder hast du eine Bergtour geplant, gehst Du Golfspielen oder Skifahren - und möchtest wissen wie das Wetter wird? Dann bist Du in den Spezialwetterbereichen unserer App genau richtig und ab sofort immer bestens informiert. FEATURES: •Punktgenaue Wetterprognosen für Deinen Standort (GPS Ortung) •Aktuelle Wetterdaten und Prognosen für jeden Ort in Deutschland •Detailprognosen für den heutigen und morgigen Tag (Vormittag, Nachmittag, Abend, Nacht) •6-Tagesprognosen: punktgenau für jeden Ort in Deutschland •Übersichtliche Anzeigen mit Wetterlage Temperatur, Windstärke, Windrichtung •Praktische Suchfunktion per Ortsname oder PLZ Eingabe •Regionale Unwetterwarnungen für Hagel, Glatteis, Sturm, Gewitter usw. •Badewetter mit Wassertemperaturen und Prognosen •Skiwetter und Prognosen für alle Skigebiete in Deutschland und Österreich •Segel- und Surfwetter mit Windrichtungen und Windstärken •Bergwetter – für alle Berge in Deutschland und Österreich •Fussballwetter – für die Stadien der 1. Bundesliga •Golfwetter – für jeden Golfplatz in Deutschland •Aktuelles Sat-Bild, Niederschlags-, Wind- und Temperaturvorhersagefilme •Internationales Wetter mit übersichtlicher weltweiter Suchfunktion •Gewünschte Orte als Favoriten speichern „Sei mit der Wetter Deutschland App immer top-informiert und lade sie gleich völlig kostenlos auf Dein Handy“. Selbstverständlich werden die Features unserer App regelmäßig und gratis erweitert. Du hast Fragen, Verbesserungsvorschläge oder Feedbacks? Sag uns bitte Bescheid: android@mowis.com Dein wetter-deutschland Team Webseite: www.wetter-deutschland.com Weather EN - the latest weather for Germany With one keystroke at all important weather information. Precise data and forecasts for any location in Germany, including many useful special weather areas. " "Weather DE - one of the best apps in the category Weather for Germany!" Do you want only a brief overview of the current weather, you know - if it remains at your BBQ party tonight dry, a forecast for the next few days - or better yet extensive information about the bioweather or your next destination? With the weather Germany app you are always top-informed, no matter where you find yourself! HOME: After the start you have now all the important weather data for your current location at a glance. Additionally you can you precise weather information and detailed forecasts for today, tomorrow - or view the next 6 days. FAVORITES: Add the key for you to locations to always be informed quickly about the current weather conditions in your favorite places around.   SEARCH / GPS: If you want to know how the weather in a particular place in Germany or in the world is, give him just one in the search. It's even easier to get weather information for your current location using the built-in GPS function.   GERMANY: Here you can find all the weather data from all over Germany. Information about the current weather conditions, forecasts, temperatures and wind values, but also forecast Movies for rain, wind and more. MORE: Are you interested in the bathing weather or are you planning a hike, you can go golfing or skiing - and want to know how the weather will be like? Then you are always well informed and immediately right into the special areas of our weather app.   FEATURES: • Pinpoint Weather forecasts for your current location (GPS locator) • Current weather conditions and forecasts for any location in Germany • Detailed forecasts for today and tomorrow day (morning, afternoon, evening, night) • 6-day forecast: pinpoint accuracy for any location in Germany • Clear displays with weather conditions, temperature, wind speed, wind direction • Convenient search function by place name or postcode input • Local Severe weather warnings for hail, ice, storm, tempest, etc. • Bathing water temperatures and weather forecasts • ski weather and forecasts for all ski areas in Germany and Austria • Sailing and windsurfing weather with wind directions and wind speeds • Mountain weather - for every mountain in Germany and Austria • Football Weather - for the first stages of National league • Golf Weather - for every golf course in Germany • Current satellite image, precipitation, wind and temperature forecast Movies • International Weather with clear global search • Desired save locations as favorites "Be with the weather app Germany always top-informed and invite them equally totally free to your mobile phone". Of course, the features our app will be regularly expanded and free. You have questions, suggestions or feedback? Please tell us about: android@mowis.com Your weather-Germany team Website: www.wetter-deutschland.com

Neuschneevorhersage, Skiwetter für Europa uvm.) hinzugefügt – bzw. übersichtlicher dargestellt (z.B. Tag im Detail, 24-Stunden Wetter uvm.).

Calendar Droid is a calendar application that works with all the calendars on your device (such as Google Calendar, Exchange, Facebook, Birthdays, etc.) The philosophy behind this app is a calendar that is easy to use, clean, intuitive, and highly customizable. This is the paid version of Calendar Droid. There is a free version that will remain free and without ads. Please consider supporting the development by buying this. FEATURES ONLY IN PAID VERSION: • Advanced recurrence/repeating rules like bi-weekly (choose 'Weekly' to show more options), etc. • Copy/paste of events • Preview on color settings • (**Android 3+ only**) Agenda widget (**Android 3+ only**) • Select which calendars to show • Change default reminder time FEATURES: • Month View / Week View / Day View / Agenda View / Weeks View • View events • Add/edit events • Settings to customize (many options for customization) • Action Bar on all versions of Android FUTURE FEATURES IN PAID VERSION ONLY: **** THESE ARE NOT IN THE VERSION YET! • Localization (more languages) • Change calendar colors • Search events • Color themes • More widgets Remember: You have to synchronize the calendars to your device for them to show up. PERMISSIONS: • READ CONTACT DATA If you have any guests (or attendees) on an event and you have that person in your contacts the app will read information from that contact and show it when viewing an event. The contact picture will show up and then clicked will take you to the default "contact clicked" scenario. I know this permission looks bad together with internet access but I do not store nor send any contact info. Only contacts that are guests to viewed events are read by the program. • READ CALENDAR EVENTS This should be obvious. Read the description again and see if you can spot what this is used for ;) • ADD OR MODIFY CALENDAR EVENTS AND SEND EMAIL TO GUESTS Again, this should be obvious. Calendar Droid needs to change your calendar events. Sending emails to guests is done when putting email addresses in the "guest" box when creating an event. • WAKE LOCK Used by the widget. This actually saves battery since the widget does not wake up the phone when it has the screen off. The wake lock is only used to keep the phone alive during updates. The update interval is controller by "alarms". • READ SYNC SETTINGS Use to read which calendars that are synchronized to the device. • GET ACCOUNTS Used to find accounts with calendars so they can be selected to be synchronized. • MANAGE ACCOUNTS Used to manage the synchronize settings for calendars under a account.
release_text: 1.6.6 - Bug fix release • Fix: The widget is now updating events and header • Fix: Rare start-up crash • Fix: Agenda view updating when new events are created • Fix: Events being on the wrong times when deleting a really early event • Fix: The add button will now select a more appropiate time if no time is selected manually

description: *** NEW : Glass Widgets 3.0 is now in BETA. The new version supports widget resizing and scrolling, and a new WYSIWYG settings screen. It rolls most of the features of Glass Widgets ICS into the 'classic' Glass Widgets edition, and the ICS edition will be deprecated once the new version leaves the BETA phase. The BETA requires Android 4.2.2 or newer. Join up at https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/103885566181234558711 *** This is a an edition of the Glass Widgets collection for use on phones and tablets running Android 3.x/4.x (Honeycomb and Ice Cream Sandwich). This edition is build to take advantages of the new possibilities in ICS and Honeycomb, such as resizable and scrollable widgets (see FAQ). It includes the following widgets: * Glass Clock Widget Enter a city name, or use geolocation to automatically find your location. Add more than one clock widget to your home screen in order to follow the time and weather around the world. * Glass Calendar Widget See the current date, along with the next events in your calendar. Resizeable and scrollable. * Glass News Widget Read your favorite RSS/Atom feeds from your home screen. Select one of the build in feeds (Google News, BBC, Reuters, WIRED ect.) or add your own custom feed. Resizeable and scrollable. * Glass All-In-One Widget All the above widgets combined into one 4x3 widget. FREE & PAID VERSIONS: All the widgets are semi-transparent, with a nice smoked glass look. The paid version will allow you to change the tint and transparency of the background and text as you wish. Note: If you already paid for the unlocker for the original Glass Widgets, you don't need to purchase it again. The same unlocker works for both Glass Widgets and Glass Widgets ICS. FAQ: 1) I can't find the widgets In Android 4.x widgets can be found in the widget-drawer, which is located on its own tab in the app-drawer. 2) I still can't find the widgets The most common cause of this problem is that the widgets are installed on the SD-card. Android doesn't like widgets on the SD-card. Please try to move them back to the main memory of the phone/tablet. 3) The widgets just aren't there! a) Try rebooting the phone/tablet - it usually solve most problems b) A few users running Android 3.2 have reported a bug, where they get the error message 'No more room on this home screen' during the installation of the widgets. The installation seems to work regardless, but the widgets still doesn't appear in the widget-drawer. Rebooting sometimes fix this, but if not then try this: Start the Android Market App and open the market settings by clicking the button in the upper right corner. Then disable the 'auto add shortcuts' option. Note: this option is in the settings for the market app, not the general phone/tablet settings. 4) How do I resize a widget? To resize a widget, you tab and hold on it. A bounding box will then appear around the widget, and you can tab any of the edges of the box and drag on them to increase or decrease the size of the widget. Be aware however, that your Android device needs to support resizing for this to work: You need to be running Android 4.x AND use a launcher that has support for resizing of third-party widgets. Unfortunately, that is not true for all versions of Samsung's TouchWiz, for instance. I recommend that you install one of the many third-party launchers from Google Play to fix this. Enjoy!
release_text: Since switching weather provider from the now terminated Google weather service to World Weather Online, the weather data for the widget have experienced a few problems. I've introduced a new cloud-based weather cache to help with the load and to reduce the quota consumed at World Weather Online. The most visible of these changes includes more flexibility in configuring the All-In-One widget. v1.9.1: Fixed App assignment

Geocache placer is a tool for Geocachers, who wants to place their own Geocache, with a very precise position. By averaging many positions you will get a position with a +/- 2 meters / +/-6 ft. Use The use is very simple, press start and wait for the first calculation of an average position. You can verify the result on the loaded map and if you are satisfied with the result, you can save it with the Share function. You can press run many times until you are satisfied with the position. Geocache Placer features: * GPS Averaging * Save your caches/locations. * Import other caches via GPX, exported from c:Geo or similar APP. * 161m/528ft Circles (Distance between caches must be greater than 161m). * Google Maps V2 * OpenStreetMaps (Online and Offline). * Internal or external GPS (Using apps like "Bluetooth GPS Provider" * Export result to GPX file or share the result using SMS / MMS / Email / Dropbox and more. * Various coordinate and unit formats * English, German, French and Danish * Optional, InApp purcase to remove Ads. Permissions * In-app purchases, used to let the user have an option to buy an "No Ads option" * Storage, use to let the app put map cache on SD card and let the user import GPX files * Network communication, used for reading Google Maps, OpenStreetMap and Ads from Google. * Your location, uses to get users GPS position. If you find bugs or want to suggest new features for the APP, please send the developer a mail on Rocologo@hotmail.com . OBS: If you want to help translating the APP to a local language please contact the developer on rocologo@hotmail.com . I'm currently looking people who want to help to translate the APP to Dutch, Russian and Norwegian. It takes about 15 minutes to translate the APP to a new language.

Support for GMap and OSM. V1.48(67) 161m/528ft circles added V1.45(63) Save your positions V1.26 (44) Support for external GPS added using apps like "Bluetooth GPS Provider" V1.14 (26) Support for OpenStreetMaps and Google Maps V2
