description: Drive Smarter. State Farm® Driver Feedback™ scores your driving and gives you tips to help you drive even better. According to the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration*, three of the riskiest driving behaviors are hard acceleration, hard deceleration, and hard swerves. So we built this app to help drivers of all ages improve in these areas. The app's accelerometer recording technology measures your acceleration, braking, and cornering. You're given a score for each, as well as an overall score for each trip you record. Helpful tips make it easier for you to take your driving to the next level. Features: - Record driving using your device's accelerometer and GPS location - View all alerts in a list view or overlaid on a map - Compare two trips against each other (the higher the score, the better the driving) - Send trip results via email and SMS - Support for multiple users Note: State Farm does not collect the trip information. The data recorded by this app will not impact your insurance rates. *Klauer, S.G. Dingus, T.A., Neale, V.L., Sudweeks, J.D., and Ramsey, D.J. "Comparing Real-World Behaviors of Drivers With High versus Low Rates of Crashes and Near-Crashes," February 2009. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

description: Draw lines between dots to complete the squares. The person who has the most filled squares once the board is complete wins! Dots is a fun, casual game played by millions that has endured through the ages. Now, with Dots for Android, you can play without picking up a pencil and paper. Runs great on Android Tablets! Dots Lite offers both a one player and two player game mode; the one player mode offers a complex AI opponent and the two player mode allows you to play against one of your friends one-on-one. The Dots AI engine adapts to the current plays so it always keeps you guessing. You won't find the AI playing the same moves over and over like in other Dots games. Dots has lots of exciting features: * One Player vs Android * Two Player * Change difficulty level without restarting * Mute and Unmute sound. * How to Play Info. This game is supported by advertisements. The permissions are used to serve these advertisements.

With Locale or Tasker and the GV SMS Plug-In you can send SMS to US Cell Phones through Google Voice, based on all conditions Locale offers, like your Location, SSID or Time. A: Do not try to open the plugin directly after install - but instead open Tasker, create a situation, you will find the Plugin in the Plugins section. Q: Can this work with 2-step verification activated? A: Yes, simply create an application specific password at your google Account settings. * * * This application is not affiliated or endorsed by Google Inc or Google Voice, Inc. It is instead developed by Steelgirder Developments * * *

description: The Oil and Gas Field Operations is mobile app is designed to ensure the accurate and regular flow of information and streamline field operations by handling large amounts of collected data quickly and easily. Contractors, subcontractors, and other professionals working in the oil and gas field can utilize multiple mobile forms and calculators included into the app to performs inspections, make risk assessments, calculate density of oil and gas, measure dill pipe capacity, displacement and weight and more! Sales and Service Order allows taking an oil or gas sales or service orders. Basic information is tracked with account and invoice numbers, along with a job overview, tank and appliances details, specific job information, parts used (quantity/price), and all calculated totals. All calculations are also done automatically in the application, rather than manually using pencil and a calculator. Initial Drilling Rig Inspection form includes equipment inspection of tracks and outriggers, moving parts, drill rig, fluids, fuel and hydraulics, fire safety, brakes, emergency stop function, operational gauges and warning light functionality. The app includes several mobile calculators that allow: - to estimate changes in the resistivity of an NaCl solution - to measure density of gas and oil under reservoir conditions - to estimate drill pipe capacity, weight and displacement The Oil & Gas Field Operations is a feature rich, convenient and easy-to-use mobile app that will certainly help you to improve accuracy on data collection. Summary app features include: • Take oil or gas Sales and Service Orders and send them to customers • Make risk assessment summaries to evaluate hazards • Inspect new drill rigs and equipment • Use multiple calculators to estimate oil and gas density, resistivity, drill pipe capacity, weight and displacement • Create your own contact list and make emergency calls when needed • Retrieve PDF forms of the estimates, timesheets, maintenance logs and daily reports and share them via email, Facebook, network drives and other sharing options available on device • Work in online/offline mode • Sync data across multiple devices • Discuss any issues and exchange ideas on different topics If you are not satisfied with our pre-built form solution, you can upload your own PDF form and 100% customize it to meet your specific business needs. Moreover, you can: - upload any PDF form or document from local storage or cloud drives - add your own fields to existing forms including datetime, text, numeric, location, signature, picture,radio, checkbox - fill in your PDF forms - print forms - share forms via email and messages - upload forms to cloud drives - save and view generated reports on your device Don't settle for an App that doesn't fit your business needs. Snappii Apps are 100% customizable, securely deployed and seamlessly integrated into you back end systems using the feature-rich Snappii Platform. Utilize feature-rich, convenient and easy to use Oil & Gas Field Operations app to perform inspections, evaluate risks, make calculations and more! By downloading, you agree to the Terms of Use at https://www.snappii.com/policy In addition to using free Oil & Gas Field Operations version you can remove all ads in the app by purchasing a $0.99 one time fee and get unlimited number of form submissions by subscribing via an optional In-App Purchase. Subscribe from your device and access these services via mobile app. In-App Subscription Details: • Monthly Unlimited Form Submission Subscription to get is $4.99 US dollars per month • Annual Unlimited Form Submission Subscription to get is $49.90 US dollars per year • Payment will be charged at confirmation of purchase • No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period • Account will be charged for renewal automatically

Touch, Look, Listen is a series of preschool learning apps for tablets and mobile phones that will delight and encourage young children as they learn their first words. Things That Go introduces early learners to over 55 busy vehicles from around the world. It's also the perfect app for parents and little ones to share, combining superb photographs, simple word labels and friendly narration. In addition, you can turn the app into a language-learning tool for students of all ages, simply by choosing a second language in the menu. Things That Go is just like a real book, so it's easy to find your way around. Each page is introduced by a playful rhyme, while bright and colorful images pop-up magically as each 3D scene opens. When your child taps a picture, they see and hear the associated word, making this a powerful tool for learning new words as well as reinforcing those they already know. With the second language option, they can explore other languages too, including Spanish, Chinese, French and German. The vehicles are grouped into 11 different categories, including trucks, diggers, tractors, trains, cars and buses, off-road vehicles, ships and boats, aircraft and fast machines. Things That Go ~ Touch, Look, Listen is part of the StoryToys Junior line. Designed for young children aged 15 months to 3+ years old, it includes the following features: • Full 3D experience - just like a real book • 11 interactive 3D pop-up scenes and over 55 words • Choice of English, French, German, Spanish and Chinese as either primary or secondary language • Fully narrated in each language by professional actors • Stunning and highly-detailed photographs showing real vehicles • Featuring a fun soundtrack and vehicle sound effects Some Reviews of StoryToys’ Previous titles: "StoryToys has near-brilliantly rethought children's books. This application evolves the very concept of what a story can be." ~ Jeremy Horowitz, iLounge “Every page keeps the reader wanting more. The interactivity of the pop-up pages is superb.” ~ Leanne McGinty, Ahgoo Review “Now THIS is what I call an app!! My jaw dropped when I started reading this interactive book.” ~ Sylvia Duckworth, French Apps for kids “Stunning. If I had to sum up this app in one word it would absolutely be stunning.” ~ Danielle Smith, TheresABook.com StoryToys awards: Two iLounge awards for best kids’ app Winner of two Mom’s Choice gold and silver awards Winner of the Editor’s Choice Award for Excellence in Design (Children’s technology review) Shortlist nominations for the FutureBook Digital Innovation Award Best Kids’ App Ever winner Longlisted for the DBW Publishing innovation award (children’s book category) Children’s Technology Review Editor’s Choice Award. ________________________ Don’t forget to share your review below, we’d love to hear what you think! Stay in touch to hear about new releases and promotions: Visit us: storytoys.com Email us: For any technical issues please email us at support@storytoys.com Like us on Facebook: Facebook.com / StoryToys Follow us on Twitter: @StoryToys

description: Download the Las Vegas Strip app to discover and explore the hottest spots on the Las Vegas Strip! Perfect for deciding where to eat, what club to visit and where the after party's at. With extensive lists of all the best restaurants, nightclubs, bars, shopping and casinos, you'll find everything you need (and then some) with the Las Vegas Strip app. Stay up to date on the latest Las Vegas news with our custom social feed including updates from all the hottest Las Vegas restaurants and nightclubs on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook and Pinterest and even get community notifications straight to your smartphone. The social feed gives you live access to all the latest specials at Vegas food icons such as Gordon Ramseys BurGR and The Bellagio’s Picasso, and what sales are happening now at The Forum Shops. Looking for something to do before you hit the clubs? The feed is especially useful for checking out amazing shows like Jersey Boys and Cirque du Soleil, all located right on the strip! The custom social feed includes the biggest Las Vegas names such as: Hakkasan Tao Oyster Bar Marquee Rehab Wet Republic Caesars Palace The Forum Shops Fashion Show Mall Crystals The Shoppes at The Palazzo Chippendales Stripburger Spago Hash House A Go Go So whether you need some espresso shots the morning after or a spot to get late night tacos, we've got you covered. Complete with maps and directions to get you where you want to go, you'll be having fun in no time with the Las Vegas Strip app!
release_text: Push notification and functionality fixes. Thanks for using the Las Vegas app from Neighbrhds!

description: The application Forward My Calls is three solutions in one. Features: ★ Manual activation for call forwarding ★ Save the last phone number used for the forwarding ★ Forward automatically your calls when you are at home or at your office ★ Forward automatically your calls when the battery of your phone is low First , it is the easier way to transfer your calls to another phone number with a single click . The application saves the last number you used to simplify the next use. Secondly , if you want to save costs on your mobile phone or if like me you prefer to use a landline at home or at your office . This application can automatically forward your calls on your landline when the WiFi network in your home or office is detected. The transfer is automatically cancelled when you leave your home or office . Finally , have you ever missed a call because you forgot to charge the battery of your phone. Now you can automatically forward all calls when your phone battery is too low. No more surprises with an important call unanswered. You can remove the Ad banner for only 0.99$ via the application menu. If you have a problem or suggestion, contact me by email , I will reply as soon as possible. You can also visit our FAQ web page : http://goo.gl/OWtuA2 WARNING Before using this application , validate with your carrier if call forwarding option is activated on your phone. Your service provider may apply a fee for each call transferred by your phone. v102
release_text: You can invert the call forward for the Wi-Fi management.

description: Mobile HotSpot is an application which facilitates your Internet phone connection sharing either with your tablet or PC via a Wi-Fi connection (tethering). You can easily share your Internet mobile with only ONE CLICK. Mobile HotSpot shows the number of devices connected to your hotspot. It is also possible to see in detail the list of all connected devices. You can define a timer to turn off your HotSpot automatically after a number of minutes. Also you can automatically activate your HotSpot as you connect your phone on AC or USB power. In the same way, as you disconnect your phone from a power source you can automatically turn off the HotSpot application. Finally, in order to save your battery "Mobile HotSpot" turns itself off and instantly stops sharing when your battery is running at less than 20%. Most parameters can be changed via a configuration screen available via the menu: SSID, timer, battery level, notification. Mobile HotSpot is the most complete application on Google Play to manage tethering and share your Internet connection from your phone. It is compatible with Desktop, Laptop, iPad, Playstation 3 (PS3), Xbox, Blueray, Smart TV. For the first five uses the application is free and without advertising. Thereafter it is possible to remove the ads for $ 1.99. (Premium version: http://goo.gl/vGL7k ) Warning, some providers block the Internet connection sharing or tethering (Ex: Sprint). This application works only if tethering is running on your phone. If Mobile HotSpot is not compatible with your device, please don’t rate it negatively. Instead send me an email describing your problem, your model device and I will be pleased to implement corrections and publish an updated version. Thank you in advance for your cooperation. Tested on: - Nexus S - Galaxy Nexus - Galaxy S III (GS3) * You must have Internet service (Ex: 3G or 4G) on your phone to use this application and share it. ** Your carrier may charge you for hotspot, validate your agreement your provider. If you need help to solve a problem, you can visit the Mobile HotSpot support or FAQ Web pages : Support : http://androidstt.com/mobilehotspot/support/ FAQ: http://androidstt.com/mobilehotspot/faq/ PLEASE ! Take 1 minute to participate to our survey to create a list of compatible devices at : http://goo.gl/932DA
release_text: ----> You can consult the list of compatible devices at http://goo.gl/Xw5x0 ** WARNING ** You must have a mobile network service (Ex: 3G , 4G or LTE) on your device to use this application. description: QC Tax is an application to calculate easily TPS and TVQ taxes for all your purchases in Québec, Canada. The application also allows the reverse calculation of taxes. It is therefore possible to obtain the amount before taxes from the amount including taxes. The App include also this features : - Calcul of the tip with the option to include or not taxes. - Calcul a % of discounts - Split the amount of the bill and tip between you and your friends It is already set for the 2013 tax change, QC Tax is the most complete App on Google Play.
release_text: Version 2.0 - Intégration du nouveau calcul des taxes pour 2013 - Ajout du calcul d'un rabais - Ajout du calcul du partage d'une facture entre amis - Demande maintenant le mode du calcul du pourboire au premier démarrage - La calculatrice fonctionne maintenant sur les Galaxy S3

description: Blast your way through the most addictive word game on the Android marketplace! Use your anagram skills to create words on the BlastWords board, then pull the plunger to destroy them in a glorious blur of gunpowder and glass shards. How many words can you blast? Features three gameplay modes: Timed: Search and destroy! Find as many words as you can in 90 seconds. Clear: Keep blasting until the board is cleared of all letter tiles. Endless: Letters keep falling. Find and blast words to prevent the board from overflowing! This game has no advertisements and no downloadable content. You get the complete, uninterrupted game experience. For the developers out there, the source code for BlastWords is now available. It is a great place to get started with Android development using libGDX. The source is here: https://github.com/louffoster/BlastWords Enjoy!!
release_text: Upgrade to latest android SDK Updated version of supporting libraries Revised tile distribution algorithm Stability and bug fixes

True friendship multiplies the good in life and divides its evils. Strive to have friends, for life without friends is like life on a desert island. The sweetest quotes for your bestie, BFF, sister from another mister or brother from another mother. Friendship is a special kind of love. And a true friend is hard to find. So when you do find one, hang on tight, don't let go and remind that friend every once in a while how much he or she means to you. Here are few inspirational friendship quotes to get you started. Share on Facebook, Watsapp or any sharing application, the best friendship quotes collection by famous authors. Enjoy inspirational, insightful and funny and famous quotes on friends and friendship. Here, you will find the most popular radio broadcasting stations: Europa Plus, Russian Radio, Our Radio, Retro FM, Rock FM, Chanson, Auto Radio and other well-known stations. The directory contains conversational, childrenб news and folks (Armenian, Chechen, Crimean, Adyghe etc.) radio broadcasting stations. Free features: •  Favorites. Add interesting broadcasting stations in a separate list to quickly find the necessary wave. •  Record. Save the air of a radio station to your device, and you can listen your favorite music being beyond the reach of network. •  Alarm clock. Set the alarm clock inside the application to wake up with your favorite radio broadcasting station. •  Sleep timer. Activate the auto switching out, and you can sleep peacefully without worrying about flat battery. •  Own radio broadcasting stations. If there is no favorite wave in the application, you can always add it by knowing the link to the stream. •  Own TV channels. You can add any TV channel yourself if your know it's stream link. RUSHh Radio is one of the few applications you really need and that you can permanently install in your mobile device. Huge selection of music suited to every fancy makes the application to be a viable alternative to an audio player. Switch on the radio broadcasting stations according to your mood – RUSH Radio made sure that everyone can find something of their own. If you are the radio/tv owner or employee and would add your radio/tv to the RUSH app then you can go to http://rushtuner.com and fill out appropriate form. description: Off road racing at its best! Fire up your engine and get ready for some heart-pounding, adrenaline-pumping, white knuckle racing. In Baja Buggy 1000 you will race along rugged tracks that wind through the mountains and hills. Go careening off cliffs, flying off jumps, and blasting up hill climbs. Hit the turbo at just the right instant to power past your competitors and grab the checkered flag. Make it to victory lane in order to earn money from your sponsors and upgrade your buggy's performance. This game is free and therefore contains ads. There is the option to remove all ads for 99 cents if you prefer. By downloading this application you are agreeing to StudyHall Entertainment LLC's End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy which can be found at: http://studyhallentertainment.com/end-user-license-agreement--eula-.html http://studyhallentertainment.com/privacy-policy.html
release_text: - New ways to earn coins and upgrade buggies faster. - Bug fixes.

description: This is a running game that involves concentration and quick decision making. Stickman must jump from rooftop to rooftop while avoiding enemy gun fire and helicopters. Draw your own scribbles on the screen to help Stickman make long jumps or to block bullets that are heading for him. There are 100 levels of glory but I have only gotten to level 12... leave a comment and let me know if you get farther! The secret to success in this game is learning how to use your "Scribbles" effectively. Not only do they provide a way to block bullets, but they can also be used to create a bridge between buildings if there is an incoming helicopter, or to do super high jumps over helicopters and other obstacles. Once you get the hang of it you will see how addicting this game is and you will be sitting on the edge of your seat hoping to see that finish line! This game was created using libLOL - "The Lehigh Overlay for LibGDX" This game is free and therefore contains ads. By downloading this application you are agreeing to StudyHall Entertainment LLC's End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy which can be found at: http://studyhallentertainment.com/end-user-license-agreement--eula-.html http://studyhallentertainment.com/privacy-policy.html

Fun maths practice for the entire school year. With 13 chapters covering over 185 math skills and an endless supply of problems aligned to Common Core, this is by far the most comprehensive math workbook in the Play Store for kids aged 4-6. ★ WINNER of Stevie Award 2013 for "Best Educational App" ★ WINNER of Tabby Award 2012 for "Best Educational and Training app" ★ WINNER of "Best Elementary Student App" (2011), by BestAppEver.com ★ REVIEWS ★ "Of the educational apps that I have reviewed, it is a more expensive application, however, the capabilities and skills that your children will master will be well worth your money!!" - www.iear.org "This app is very educational and has a vast amount of content" - Giggle Apps ★ KEY FEATURES ★ + Interactive Content - Children drag and drop shapes, pop bubbles, rotate clock hands and more to solve problems. With it's simple user interface and visual graphics, problem solving is never boring. + Personalized Learning - Each topic starts with easy level and based on the child's progress, the medium and hard levels are gradually unlocked. The practice mode can be used to focus on problem areas. + Fun Games - Take a break between sessions and enjoy playing with fun creatures in the aquarium. Earn new ones such as angel fish, clown fish, squid, crabs as you earn more points. The more you practice more the prizes! + Weekly Email Reports - You can track your child's progress reports by our awesome weekly email reporting feature. Parents love it. + Scratch Pad for Rough Work - Child can use a scratch pad for all his rough work. ★ TOPICS COVERED ★ StudyPad has the best suite of maths Apps on digital devices. Each app is comprehensive with virtually infinite number of questions covering wide range of topics. All the content is aligned to common core standards. This app covers following topics: 1. Place Value - Ones; Tens; Numbers to 100 2. Number Sense - Counting; Compare numbers; Order numbers 3. Addition Concepts - Sentences; Add with models; Model part-part whole; Add 0; Add in any order; Make a number 4. Subtraction Concepts - Sentences; Subtract with models; Subtract 0; all; Take apart numbers; Subtract to compare 5. Addition Strategy - Count on; Double facts; Make a ten; Add three numbers; Add numbers to 10; Word problems 6. Subtraction Strategy - Sentences; Relate addition; Fact families; Numbers to 10; Word problems 7. Addition and Subtraction - Equivalent sentences; Fact families; Mixed operations 8. Two Digit Operations - Add tens; Add ones; Two digit subtraction 9. Data and Graphs - Pictographs; Tally charts; Bar graphs 10. Time - Read analog and digital clocks 11. Money - Identify coins; Count coins 12. Addition Refresher - Add 0; Add 1; Add 2; Add 3; Add 4; Add 5; Add 6; Add 7; Add 8; Add 9 13. Subtraction Refresher - Subtract 0; Subtract 1; Subtract 2; Subtract 3; Subtract 4; Subtract 5; Subtract 6; Subtract 7; Subtract 8; Subtract 9 ★ SPLASH MATH USERS ★ + More than 25,000 classrooms + Parents for daily homework, practice + Teachers in the classroom + Homeschoolers + Parents for previous grade review + Parents for preparation for next grade * StudyPad Apps also available for iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch ★ CONTACT ★ + Facebook: http://facebook.com/SplashMath + Twitter: @SplashMath + Website: http://SplashMath.com

description: A simple strobe light application which turns the camera flash light on and off based on configurable delays. *** Not compatible with all devices, please see below for details *** Both the time the light is on and the time the light is off can be configured independently to fully customise the type of flashing you require. For best results, try a very low but not zero value for the "on" time, and a medium to low value for the "off" time. The timing is not guaranteed to be exact, at the very high speeds the Android system might not be able to control the flash light accurately. This application has been developed on a HTC Desire, and has only been tested by me on a HTC Desire and a Samsung Galaxy S3. I make no guarantees that this will work on other Android devices, though it probably will if you have a back-facing camera with a flashlight. I have, however, had reports of it working on a number of other devices, including the Samsung Galaxy S2, HTC Incredible, HTC Evo 4G, HTC Inspire 4G, Xperia Play, HTC Sensation, HTC Wildfire, HTC Incredible 2, HTC Desire HD, and the HTC Incredible S. There have also been reports of it NOT working on various devices - please email me if it doesn't work for you stating what device you have, and I'll see what I can do *** Permissions *** The Camera permission is required to allow the application access to the Camera Flashlight. At no point are any pictures taken. *** Bugs, etc *** If you find any bugs, please do let me know here: https://github.com/stwalkerster/strobelight/issues If you want to have a look over the source code, it's freely available at https://github.com/stwalkerster/strobelight

Enjoy sweets!

description: Cette application gratuite accompagne le livre de Frédéric Maxant "Plongée Subaquatique - Gestion et optimisation des apprentissages" et permet à l'utilisateur de gérer sa fréquence cardiaque. Développé par le Dr Servan-Schreiber la cohérence cardiaque est utilisée dans un but médical pour traiter certaines pathologies cardiaques, mais s’étend au traitement d’ordre émotionnel lié au dysfonctionnement du SNA (dépression, anxiété). Le but étant que, par une méthode simple et applicable par tous, on puisse agir sur nos émotions. La méthode est depuis utilisée par de nombreux coachs sportifs et préparateurs mentaux. Les connaissances que nous avons développées ont montré que la régulation cardiaque par définition est une fonction qui échappe à notre volonté. Cela entre donc en contradiction avec la notion de régulation consciente. L’idée est de contourner le problème en utilisant la respiration et plus précisément le baroréflexe. Dans le fascicule, l'auteur propose au moniteur de plongée en activité, ou en devenir, des solutions simples et novatrices, déjà testées et appliquées dans de nombreux domaines et ayant pour unique but d’optimiser l’apprentissage. Moniteur de plongée professionnel, Frédéric Maxant crée en 1993 sa structure "Plongée Carnon". Parallèlement, depuis 15 ans, il est fortement impliqué dans la formation et la certification des BEES 1 et désormais des DEJEPS, option plongée du Creps de Montpellier. Il est également l’auteur de deux ouvrages de photographies, "Thau, oasis de vie" et "Hérault, coulisse d’un fleuve", éditions Biotope. BEES 2 option Plongée Subaquatique Moniteur Fédéral 2e degré FFESSM Instructeur Nitrox/Trimix Scaphandrier Classe 2 mention B This free application accompanies the book of Frederick Maxant "Underwater Diving - Management and optimization of learning" and allows the user to manage his heart rate. Developed by Dr. Servan-Schreiber cardiac coherence is used for medicinal purposes to treat certain heart conditions, but extends to the emotional processing related to ANS dysfunction (depression, anxiety). The aim is that, by a simple and applicable method for all, we can act on our emotions. The method has been used by many sports coaches and mental trainers. The knowledge that we have developed have shown that cardiac regulation by definition is a function that can not be controlled. This therefore contradicts the notion of conscious control. The idea is to circumvent the problem by using breathing and specifically the baroreflex. In the booklet, the author proposes to monitor diving activity, or become, simple and innovative solutions already tested and applied in many fields and whose sole purpose is to optimize learning. Professional diving instructor Frederick Maxant structure created in 1993 "Diving Carnon." Meanwhile, for 15 years, he is heavily involved in the training and certification of BEES 1 and now the DEJEPS, dive option Creps Montpellier. He is also the author of two books of photographs, "Thau, an oasis of life" and "Hérault, slides of a river," Biotope editions. BEES 2 Diving Underwater option Federal Monitor second degree FFESSM Nitrox / Trimix Instructor Diver 2 mention Class B

description: - No requiere conexión a Internet para su funcionamiento - Diseño e interfaz gráfica agradable - Crear notas a los versículos - Buscador de palabras - Compartir versículos con los contactos por: Correo, Facebook, Twiter, etc. - Versión Católica La Biblia (del griego τα βιβλία, ta biblía, ‘los libros’) es el conjunto de libros canónicos del judaísmo y el cristianismo. La canonicidad de cada libro varía dependiendo de la tradición adoptada. Según las religiones judía y cristiana, transmite la palabra de Dios. La Biblia ha sido traducida a 2303 idiomas La Biblia es una recopilación de textos que en un principio eran documentos separados (llamados «libros»), escritos primero en hebreo, arameo y griego durante un periodo muy dilatado y después reunidos para formar el Tanaj (Antiguo Testamento para los cristianos) y luego el Nuevo Testamento. Ambos testamentos forman la Biblia cristiana. En sí, los textos que componen la Biblia fueron escritos a lo largo de aproximadamente 1000 años (entre el 900 a. C. y el 100 d. C.). Los textos más antiguos se encuentran en el Libro de los Jueces («Canto de Débora») y en las denominadas fuentes "E" (tradición elohísta) y "J" (tradición yahvista) de la Torá (llamada Pentateuco por los cristianos), que son datadas en la época de los dos reinos (siglos X a VIII a. C.). El libro completo más antiguo, el de Oseas es también de la misma época. El pueblo judío identifica a la Biblia con el Tanaj, no consintiendo bajo ningún concepto el término Antiguo Testamento y no acepta la validez del llamado Nuevo Testamento, reconociéndose como texto sagrado únicamente al Tanaj. El canon de la Biblia que conocemos hoy fue sancionado por la Iglesia católica, bajo el pontificado de san Dámaso I, en el Sínodo de Roma del año 382, y esta versión es la que Jerónimo de Estridón tradujo al latín. Dicho canon consta de 73 libros: 46 constitutivos del llamado Antiguo Testamento, incluyendo 7 libros llamados actualmente Deuterocanónicos (Tobit, Judit, I Macabeos, II Macabeos, Sabiduría, Eclesiástico y Baruc) ―que han sido impugnados por judíos y protestantes― y 27 del Nuevo Testamento. Fue confirmado en el Concilio de Hipona en el año 393, y ratificado en los Concilios III de Cartago, en el año 397, y IV de Cartago, en el año 419. Cuando reformadores protestantes lo impugnaron, el canon católico fue nuevamente confirmado por decreto en la cuarta sesión del Concilio de Trento del 8 de abril de 1546. Ninguna de estas decisiones fue reconocida ni asumida por muchos protestantes, surgidos a partir del siglo XVI, ni por distintas denominaciones vinculadas al protestantismo surgidas a partir del siglo XIX. El canon de las Biblias cristianas ortodoxas es aún más amplio que el canon de las Biblias católicas romanas, e incluye el Salmo 151, la Oración de Manasés, el Libro III de Esdras y el Libro III de los Macabeos. En adición a estos, el Libro IV de Esdras y el Libro IV de los Macabeos figuran, asimismo, como apéndices en muchas importantes versiones y ediciones de la Biblia cristiana ortodoxa. El Antiguo Testamento narra principalmente la historia de los hebreos y el Nuevo Testamento la vida, muerte y resurrección de Jesús, su mensaje y la historia de los primeros cristianos. El Nuevo Testamento fue escrito en lengua griega koiné. En él se cita con frecuencia al Antiguo Testamento de la versión de los Setenta, traducción al griego del Antiguo Testamento realizada en Alejandría (Egipto) en el siglo III a. C. - No Internet connection required for operation - Design and nice GUI - Create notes to verses - Search words - Share verses with contacts: Email, Facebook, Twitter, etc.. - Catholic Version The Bible (from Greek τα βιβλία, ta Bible, 'books') is the set of canonical books of Judaism and Christianity. The canonicity of each book varies depending on the tradition adopted. According to Jewish and Christian religions, spread the word of God. The Bible has been translated into 2303 languages The Bible is a collection of texts that were originally separate documents (called "books"), written first in Hebrew, Aramaic and Greek for a very dilated and then assembled to form the Tanakh (Old Testament for Christians) and then the New Testament. Both testaments form the Christian Bible. In itself, the texts that make up the Bible were written over approximately 1000 years (from 900 to. C. and 100 d. C.). The oldest texts are in the Book of Judges ("Song of Deborah") and so-called sources "E" (Elohist tradition) and "J" (Yahwist tradition) of the Torah (Pentateuch by Christians call), which is dated at the time of the two kingdoms (tenth to eighth. C.). The oldest complete book, that of Hosea is also from the same era. The Jewish people in the Bible identifies the Tanakh, not indulging in any way the term Old Testament and does not accept the validity of the so-called New Testament, recognized as sacred only the Tanakh text. The canon of the Bible we know today was sanctioned by the Catholic Church under Pope Damasus I, at the Synod of Rome in the year 382, ​​and this version is the Estridón Jerome translated into Latin. This charge consists of 73 books: 46 constituting the so-called Old Testament, including 7 now called Deuterocanonical books (Tobit, Judith, Maccabees, II Maccabees, Wisdom, Sirach, and Baruch), which have been challenged by Jews and Protestants, and 27 of New Testament. It was confirmed at the Council of Hippo in 393, and ratified by the Councils III of Carthage, in 397, and IV of Carthage in the year 419. When I challenged Protestant reformers, the Catholic canon was again confirmed by decree in the fourth session of the Council of Trent of April 8, 1546. None of these decisions was recognized and accepted by many Protestants, arising from the XVI century, and by various names linked to Protestantism emerged from the nineteenth century. The canon of orthodox Christian Bibles is even broader than the canon of Roman Catholic Bibles, including Psalm 151, the Prayer of Manasseh, the third book of Ezra and the Book III of the Maccabees. In addition to these, the Book IV of IV Esdras and the Book of Maccabees are also important as appendices in many versions and editions of the Bible Christian Orthodox. The Old Testament tells the story mainly Jews and the New Testament, the life, death and resurrection of Jesus, his message and the history of the early Christians. The New Testament was written in Koine Greek. It is frequently quoted the Old Testament of the Septuagint, the Greek translation of the Old Testament produced at Alexandria (Egypt) in the third century. C.

- Really simple to use, do not require an internet connection; - Search by book name, chapter number or by word; - Quick and simple navigation between pages; - It´s possible to share any verse with the apps in your Android; - Easy to read because there is a nice contrast difference between verses; - Catholic Version; The Bible (from Koine Greek τὰ βιβλία, tà biblía, "the books") is a canonical collection of texts considered sacred in Judaism as well as in Christianity. The term Bible is shared between the two religions, although the contents of each of their collections of canonical texts is not the same. Different religious groups include different books within their canons, in different orders, and sometimes divide or combine books, or incorporate additional material into canonical books. The Hebrew Bible, or Tanakh, contains twenty-four books divided into three parts: the five books of the Torah ("teaching" or "law"), the Nevi'im ("prophets"), and the Ketuvim ("writings"). Christian Bibles range from the sixty-six books of the Protestant canon to the eighty-one books of the Ethiopian Orthodox Church canon. The first part of Christian Bibles is the Old Testament, which contains, at minimum, the twenty-four books of the Hebrew Bible divided into thirty-nine books and ordered differently than the Hebrew Bible. The Catholic Church and Eastern Christian churches also hold certain deuterocanonical books and passages to be part of the Old Testament canon. The second part is the New Testament, containing twenty-seven books: the four Canonical gospels, Acts of the Apostles, twenty-one Epistles or letters, and the Book of Revelation. By the 2nd century BCE Jewish groups had called the Bible books "holy," and Christians now commonly call the Old and New Testaments of the Christian Bible "The Holy Bible" (τὰ βιβλία τὰ ἅγια, tà biblía tà ágia) or "the Holy Scriptures" (η Αγία Γραφή, e Agía Graphḗ). Many Christians consider the whole canonical text of the Bible to be divinely inspired. The oldest surviving complete Christian Bibles are Greek manuscripts from the 4th century. The oldest Tanakh manuscript in Hebrew and Aramaic dates to the 10th century CE, but an early 4th-century Septuagint translation is found in the Codex Vaticanus. The Bible was divided into chapters in the 13th century by Stephen Langton and into verses in the 16th century by French printer Robert Estienne and is now usually cited by book, chapter, and verse. The Bible has estimated annual sales of 25 million copies, and has been a major influence on literature and history, especially in the West where it was the first mass printed book.

description: RFI Pure Radio provides you with a free, simple and friendly app to listen to live streaming and on-demand radio news and music programs from RFI on your Android phone and tablet. Download this FREE app now, and listen to the latest daily international news and music programs, in one of these languages: English, French, Chinese, Spanish, Russian, Persian, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, Vietnamese, Cambodian, Romanian, Hausa, Kiswahili. RFI Pure Radio is a completely free app and gives listeners access to: - LIVE streaming of all RFI Pure Radio's news bulletins, shows, interviews, music programs and chronicles - on-demand functionality to catch-up with past news and music programs or listen to them at your own chosen time and convenience - a rich multilingual service with 13 languages to choose from RFI Pure Radio is a news and music radio by Radio France Internationale and RFI Românǎ

70+ dynamic clock widgets for your homescreen, ad free. Battery - Time - Weather! email skwong@consultant.com for support and suggestions! Can be set to launch any app via widget click. All widgets editable on the phone and via JSON. Tested to work with WidgetLocker. For those curious about OMC's permissions: Device & app history: OMC checks the currently-running app so it can sleep if the launcher is not on top, saving battery. Location: Required for weather updates. Photos/Media/Files: Writes to OMC's app-storage folder on your "external" storage. This permission is no longer required for KitKat and above, but some custom ROMs still error out without it. Run at startup: OMC's clock has to start refreshing once the phone boots. View network connections: Full network access: Used to download clock packs and show latest release notes. Set an alarm: Used for the tap-to-launch function to open up your device's alarm screen.

description: Guess how many fingers your opponent is hiding from you! Or let him guess! • Addictive gameplay! • Singleplayer. Play alone against the computer. • Online Multiplayer. Play against players all over the world! • Unlock Achievements! • Send your score to Leaderboard! • FREE!

Donut Maker is here! Tie on your apron because we are going to fry up some greasy and messy fun! First, mix the donut dough ingredients. After the dough is thoroughly mixed, roll it out using the rolling pin. Then, use the donut cutter to cut out each individual donut. Now, place each donut in the fryer until it is golden brown. Be careful not to forget about them or they will disappear in the grease! Once the donuts are done to perfection, you get to decorate them! There are several categories to choose from so your donuts have just the right amount of icing and sprinkles! The decorating categories are: - Plates- Choose from a variety of plates. - Icing- Choose from an array of colors for your base icing. - Paint on icing- Find a contrasting color to paint on your own design. - Icing decorations- Select fun icing swirls and designs to add to your donuts. - Icing accents- Add some stars, dots, and loop-de-loops. - Candies and nuts- Sprinkle on the colored candies- perhaps ones that represent the closest holiday? Finally, it’s time to eat your donut… or two… or three! Post it on Facebook or email it to a friend! Or, save it in the fridge to show off or eat later!
release_text: Donut Maker is here! Tie on your apron because we are going to fry up some greasy and messy fun!

description: The only available ultimately complete piano lessons and keyboard training course app! Adictum Piano Lessons is the fastest and most powerful piano training app out there. Learn how to play piano in a very contemporary way, just as you have always wanted. This doesn't focus on playing or learning little melodies or classical pieces. This is ideal for those who want to learn modern techniques that follow the current musical tendencies that are used in rock, pop, electronica, jazz, etc. Anyone who wants to learn to play with a band and accompany other instruments, or play piano or keyboard and sing at the same time, or compose and record their own music would greatly benefit from a more contemporary approach at learning. Each lesson entails high quality piano training videos which display graphics of the chords simultaneously with each exercise. This system is extremely visual, intuitive and comprehensive. What's Unique About This Method? • Piano lessons that teach you to play keyboards in a modern and contemporary way • Is based on chord progressions which progressively teaches the ability to improvise with chords with both hands • Is not overwhelming with millions of unnecessary exercises and concepts • Piano app includes excellent videos with killer exercises that will make you excel in record time • Also contains 120 essential chords and inversions which you can carry with you at all times After completing this program, the final result will be positively surprising as you are able to recognize and play most of the common chords in all of their positions. You will learn piano and reach the possibility of being able to improvise harmonically, accompanying a voice or other instruments or even start composing your own songs on the piano, keyboards, and/or synthesizers. description: Adictum Drum Lessons Pro app includes all of the techniques and training that you will need to start drumming in a quick and modern way. App features over 50 professionally developed lessons, designed to teach the most contemporary rhythmic patterns. These exercises are built with various types of rhythmic figures and will teach the drummer how to read and write drum notation. You will develop hand independence, improve your timing, and will also be able to read and decipher any percussion instrument notation. Understand the placement of each instrument of the drum set: kick (bass), snare, toms, hi hat, and crash. This method is very simple and extremely visual and does not include any complicated or unnecessary explanations. Videos are also available for each drum lesson for better understanding of how rhythm is played and how drum notation and drum notes are read.

Learn to read music for drums as you play and experiment on your very own virtual drum set! Adictum Drums is the ultimate system for learning the most modern rhythmic techniques for drums. This is the only app where you can learn how to read music for drums and play on an actual drum kit at the same time. ***Note: To remove the very small ad from this app, simply purchase the paid version. This is the Free Version of Adictum Drums and does not include all of the exercises and drum beats of the regular version. Many exercises (rhythmic patterns or drum beats) are visible on the top of the screen and are easily accessed as you play. They are very clear and easy to read, starting from the most basic level to advanced. Videos are offered for all drum lessons for better understanding of how rhythmic pattern is played and how drum notation and drum notes are read. Feel free to improvise with the drum kit included in this app and play along with any song that you wish! Drum set includes standard drum kit with realistic drum pads and sounds. Instruments included are: • Kick/Bass • Snare • Hi-hat • Toms • Floor Tom • 2 Crash different sizes and sounds • Ride • Electronic Pads (Snare/Claps & Bass)

Adictum Dubstep Maker is a real dubstep maker which allows you to play and improvise with tons of sounds and effects such as wobble and wub bass. App includes two mini-keyboards for playing bass and synthesizer notes and chords to incorporate into your music. Dubstep beats and syncopated and shuffled drum patterns, which characterize this specific music style, are displayed in a very organized set and are very easy to access and play. Unique feature: Create your very own bass lines and riffs with fat bass and drop sounds with the upper mini-keyboard simultaneously as you play melodies with the lower mini-keyboard. High quality sounds produced by using filter cutoff, oscillators, distortion and various other parameters. Very modern and easy to use user interface which makes playing music live very simple and fun! Connect headphones and/or speakers to your device and transport yourself the the world of dubstep and electronic music! This is the best dubstep maker app out there for any beginner or pro DJ. You do not need any prior DJ experience in order to make the coolest dubstep electronic music.

The only app that actually allows you to make and play electronic music live! Modern and attractive user interface which allows the user to play and mix REAL electronic music such as: trance, house, dubstep, dance, techno, etc. App is packed full of high quality sounds, effects, instruments, and beats. This app is not just a sound sampler or a simple drum machine, yet it is an actual creator of electronic music for people who are serious about making music. No need to have any prior knowledge on creating electronic music, just experiment with the app and you will sound like a pro. User interface is very intuitive and simple to use. Adictum Electronic Music Maker also includes mini bass and lead synth keyboards with multi-touch pads which allow for the creation of real melodies, harmonies, chords, riffs, and arpeggios. Mix music and choose from beats with various tempos and rhythms to stylize your music. Added loop features permit unlimited hours of jamming, improvising, creativity and enjoyment. Simply connect speakers to your device and start DJing and producing real electronic music at any live event, rave, or party. This is best and most professional electronic music maker, trance music maker, house music maker or dubstep music maker for any professional or amateur DJ, mixer, or electronic musician out there!

Adictum Piano Scales is the ultimate system for learning to play scales on the piano or keyboard. This is the ONLY app which teaches you exactly how to play piano scales. You will learn exactly which fingers to use and the accurate fingering to utilize in order to play scales efficiently and with ease. This app includes videos and images which clearly teach how to play the major and minor piano scales. These scales are used in almost every single style of music played throughout the world and are vital to learn when wanting to become proficient at the piano or keyboard. Each piano lesson includes images which show the notes that are played in every scale as well as the exact fingers that play each note. Close-up shots are used in each video so that every note played of each scale is very clear and visible, making it simple to learn. Each scale includes detailed instructions on exactly how each note is played. This is the most killer course for pianists or keyboardists who wish to be proficient at playing piano scales or who like to improvise with piano solos.

Adictum Drums is the ultimate system for learning the most modern rhythmic techniques for drums. Learn how to read music for drums and experiment with your very own drum set right in the palm of your hands. Drum set includes standard drum kit with realistic drum sounds as well as additional electronic drum pads to accompany for added contemporary sound and fun. Instruments included are: • Kick/Bass • Snare • Hi-hat • Toms • Floor Tom • 2 Crash - different sizes & sounds • Ride • Electronic Pads (Snare/Claps & Bass) Tons of exercises (rhythmic patterns or drum beats) are visible on the top of the screen and are easily accessed as you play. They are very clear and easy to read, starting from the most basic level to advanced. Videos are also available for all of the drum lessons for better understanding of how rhythm is played and how drum notation and drum notes are read. Feel free to improvise with the drum kit included in this app and play along with any song that you wish!

Learn how to draw eyes with this easy to follow guide filled with techniques in quick and intuitive lessons. Lessons include how to draw realistic eyes, the measurements of the face and where to place the eye, how to draw eyes in many different views, and how to draw eyes with various expressions. This app teaches skills that any aspiring artist, comic artist, or cartoonist needs in order to perfect their art style. Drawing eyes will no longer be challenging and frustrating if you follow these self-explanatory step-by-step directions.

Learn Spanish with this very intuitive and user friendly app which includes audio and images displayed in a very unique format. Learn over 500 words and phrases in easy to follow lessons. Lessons are geared toward those who wish to learn with a natural and quick learning system and includes simple and easy to understand audio and images. Just tap on any image and you will hear the pronunciation of the word or phrase clearly and instantly. Feel free to tap the image as many times as you need to in order to repeat and learn the audio. Spanish lessons in this app are taught with a neutral accent so that it is understood by any Spanish speaker. description: Rex is a mighty and fearsome tyrannosaurus… well, one day he will be. Right now, all he’s got is one tiny tooth, so even his plant-eating dino friends aren’t afraid of him. Help Rex and friends collect these precious gems while avoiding deep crevices and volcanic spikes and enjoy all thehijinks on the way! Grab your friends and explore the world of a million years agoin this pre-hysterical adventure! - Choose your favorite dino baby and discover a rich, expansive world - Bounce and hop your way through the wild with an exotic jungle beat - Enjoy simple and addictive gameplay: touch the screen to jumpover obstacles

description: Named "New & Noteworthy" and "What's Hot" by Apple. *Winner of YouTube's January 2012 "On the Rise" award!* "A 'Must Have' For Traveling To California." — AppTudes.com "Born and raised in California, Veronica has 30+ years of travel experience that she’s translated into an informative YouTube series about all the Golden State has to offer. Ever wondered what the best strategy is for tackling Disneyland? Planning a trip to San Diego and want advice about must-do sites and activities? Think you want to visit Yosemite but want a preview of the best wilderness hiking trails? Answer any of these questions and more with Veronica’s detailed and digestible travel videos, with more than 150 video reviews to watch." — Christine Wang and Devon Storbeck, YouTube employees "Whether you’ve lived in the Golden State all of your life or are just looking to become a first-time visitor, California Essential Guide will help you find something new and exciting to explore." — AppAdvice.com "Veronica has become the go-to authority on California travel." — Nationally syndicated columnist Tim Carter ✭ Why this App? ✭ • Travel expert Veronica Hill has packed more than 8,500 full-color photos, 758 attractions, and 130+ videos into this California travel guide, offering both popular (and offbeat) destinations. • Each selection is hand-picked by the author for its unique entertainment value. Quickly check an attraction's hours and admission, get driving directions, or call with the touch of a button. • Get expert advice from the author, or leave your own tips and reviews with our unique two-way commentary! ✭ What's inside? ✭ • Detailed descriptions, photos, admission prices, hours, phone numbers and off-line maps. • More than 100 California travel videos, produced by the author • Top California attractions, zoos, museums, aquariums and theme parks • California national parks and state parks including Yosemite, Death Valley and Joshua Tree • Camping and RV guides • Guides to Disneyland and California Adventure • California wine country (including Napa, Sonoma, Temecula and Santa Barbara) • All 21 California missions • California events • Guide to Channel Islands and Catalina Island • California ghost towns • Route 66 landmarks and diners • Haunted California hotels and houses • California driving tours • Quirky roadside attractions • Free California family day trips and activities • Los Angeles travel guide with Hollywood attractions • Unique overnights, from tree houses and yurts to celebrity estates • Historic California hotels and restaurants • Adventure travel • California travel tips and hotel deals Questions or problems? E-mail veronica@californiatravelexpert.com *** Please take a few moments to give us a 5-star rating and review on iTunes. This keeps those free updates coming! *** Demo video at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rry8G_0c858 ★ About the Author ★ California native Veronica Hill spent 15 years as a travel editor before launching CaliforniaTravelExpert.com. Her writing has appeared in Fodors guides to California/National Parks of the West, US Magazine, Rolling Stone, Food & Wine, Associated Press and Freedom News Service. ★ About Sutro Media ★ This guide is published in partnership with Sutro Media. By enabling local writers to share their expertise on mobile phones, Sutro Media is making it easier and more fun to explore the world! If you have any problems, comments, or suggestions for improvement, we'd love to hear from you - letusknow@sutromedia.com

description: Schweizer Reisefuehrer Swiss Travelguide Voyage en Suisse Swiss Travelguide 2 Details Schweizer Reisefuehrer 4 Details Voyage en Suisse 6 Details Schweiz Landkarte 8 Details Bus und Gruppentouristik 10 Details swissinfo 12 Details swissinfo 14 Details Wetter in der Schweiz 16 Details Die Schweiz (franz. Suisse, ital. Svizzera, rätoroman. Svizra), ist ein Binnenstaat in Mitteleuropa. Sie grenzt an Frankreich, Deutschland, Österreich, Italien und Liechtenstein und besteht aus 23 Kantonen bzw. 26, wenn die Halbkantone einzeln gezählt werden. Switzerland (German: Schweiz, French: Suisse, Italian: Svizzera, Romansch: Svizra, Latin: Confoederatio Helvetica) is a landlocked country in Central Europe. It has borders with France to the west, Italy to the south, Austria and Liechtenstein to the east and Germany to the north. The climate is temperate, but varies with altitude. Switzerland has cold, cloudy, rainy/snowy winters and cool to warm, cloudy, humid summers with occasional showers. Switzerland is known for its mountains (Alps in south, Jura in northwest) but it also has a central plateau of rolling hills, plains, and large lakes. The highest point is Dufourspitze at 4,634 m while Lake Maggiore is only 195 m above sea level. La Suisse est constituée de 26 cantons dont 6 ne disposent que d'un siège au lieu de deux au Conseil des États et ne comptent que pour moitié lors des votations fédérales. Ces 26 cantons sont répartis en 3 régions linguistiques : La Suisse alémanique représentée par 21 cantons : Bâle ville, Bâle campagne, Berne, Lucerne, Unterwald, Nidwald, Zürich, Argovie, Saint Gall, Appenzell Rhodes-Intérieures, Appenzell Rhodes-Extérieures, les Grisons, Schwyz, Uri, Schaffhouse, Soleure, Glaris, Zoug, Thurgovie, le Valais et Fribourg La Suisse romande ou francophone représentée par 7 cantons : Berne, Fribourg, Genève, Jura, Neuchâtel, le Valais, Vaud. La Suisse italienne représentée par les cantons du Tessin et des Grisons. Berne, Fribourg et le Valais sont trois cantons bilingues Français/Allemand et le canton des Grisons est le seul à être trilingue (Allemand/Italien/Romanche).

Play as Guest to get started quickly - OR use the Google account already on your device and take your bankroll wherever you go. ♣ Generous 100,000 Free Chips to start! ♣ Win Free Chips every day - up to 1,000,000 chips! ♣ Exciting Fresh Look - not that same old boring poker theme that’s been cloned over and over. ♣ Join a Friend at their table or Invite a Friend to play at yours. ♣ Compete on Leaderboards with your Friends or other players Globally! ♣ Want to play with JUST your friends? Create a Private Table. ♣ Earn more chips with Sit and Go Tournaments. ♣ Play the way you like - Fast/Normal tables; 2, 5, or 9 player tables; wide range of blinds and buy-in options. ♣ Improve your Game! The dealer helps you with subtle strategy tips. ♣ Eye-popping HD graphics scaled exactly for your device. ♣ Keep Playing on any Device you have - Your profile and stats are saved in the cloud. Done playing on your phone? Just pick up your tablet! ♣ Personalize Yourself - Use your profile image or choose your avatar. ♣ Win Free Chips every time you Level Up! ♣ New to the Game? No problem - Interactive Tutorials show you how to play. ♣ Stats Galore! Many statistics are kept so you can track and improve your play. We aim to be the poker game that YOU want to play. We don’t want to be sketchy or spammy like the other games. You can let us know how to make it better: feedback@SyriousGames.com PERMISSIONS EXPLAINED: - Network communication - Full network access: Allows you to connect to our servers and play with others globally. - Microphone - Record audio: Enables Voice Chat. You choose when to turn the microphone on by pushing a button to talk. - Your accounts - Use accounts on the device: Allows you to login with your Google account which is already setup on your device. This eliminates the need to register and remember another password. - Storage - Modify or delete the contents of your USB storage: Used for temporary caching of files. Brought to you by Syrious Games®

This is very powerful app contains everything you need to provide better care to your patients including information on dosing and administration, adverse reactions, important interactions and patient teaching. It can be carried anywhere without any fear of loss of internet connection. description: SM Calculator is for basic purposes, but can handle more advanced calculations when you need it. SM Calculator supports following functions: - tangent (tan) - sine (sin) - cosine (cos) - arc sine (asin) - arc cosine (acos) - arc tangent (atan) - hyperbolic sine (sinh) - hyperbolic cosine (cosh) - hyperbolic tangent (tanh) - degrees and radians - Euler's number e raised to the power (exp) - natural logarithm (ln) - base 10 logarithm (log) - square root - cube root - square power - cube power - percentages SM Calculator also has some extra features like: - endless results and equations history - ability to paste result or equation from history to current one - ability to copy calculations into clipboard - ability to set custom constants - ability to personalize Go ahead and try my calculator, I think it's worth it. Feel free to contact me and let me know what you think, what would you change. Any suggestions are welcome and they will be considered. If you find any bug please contact me immediately and I will do my best to fix it asap.
release_text: - ability to customize the UI colors with Android 5.0 Lollipop palette - ability to set font style - mostly UI changes - performance improvements

description: T2 Mood Tracker is designed to help you track your emotional experience over time and to provide you with a tool to share this information with your health care provider. This app comes with six pre-loaded issues: anxiety, depression, general well-being, head injury, post-traumatic stress, and stress. You can also add customized scales on any topic (e.g., a pain scale). You use simple sliders to rate yourself on these behavioral categories and the app automatically graphs your inputs. You can also make notes describing things that happened during the day that may have affected your moods. This provides you and your health care provider with a complete tool to help you uncover patterns in how you are feeling. It may also help you to evaluate the impact of daily events or the effects of treatment on your mood. T2 Mood Tracker was developed by the National Center for Telehealth & Technology (T2), the Defense Department’s primary agency for applying innovative technology to issues of psychological health and traumatic brain injury WHAT’S NEW • Report generator makes sharing results simple! Generate PDF or CSV reports to print or email to your health care provider. • Backup database saves all your data on the SD card. Easily move your T2 Mood Tracker results to a new phone or save a backup off-phone, so you don’t lose your data if you lose your phone. • Locate psychological health support in your area via the Outreach Center link. • Program the reminder to update your moods as often as you like - weekly to several times a day. • Pre-loaded with six common issues. Customize with ANY feeling or issue you want to track. • Results display in easy to read color graphs with pinch zoom, customizable symbols, and options to display as much or as little data you desire.

app_name: 食べラ -料理写真をおいしく加工、共有できる無料カメラアプリ
description: 毎日の「おいしい」を共有しよう ♪ただのカメラアプリじゃない！ 食べラは、ランキングとクチコミのグルメサイト『食べログ』が作った、無料のグルメ写真共有アプリです。料理の写真を独自のフィルタ・画像補正でより美味しそうに加工し、食べログの店舗情報と連携させて、FacebookやTwitter上の友人や他の食べラユーザーと共有できます。 ♪毎日の「おいしい」はよりおいしく！ 『目の前にある美味しそうな料理が、スマートフォンのカメラで撮影すると美味しさが伝わらない写真になってしまったことはありませんか?』 食べラは、暗い店内で撮った料理の写真でも、7種類のフィルタ・8種類のフレーム・ぼかしや明るさ調整の画像加工の機能で簡単に美味しく、魅力的で印象的な写真に加工することができます。 ♪毎日の「おいしい」は記録しよう！ 『あの時食べたアレ、美味しかったなぁ…どこのお店だっけ？』 食べラで投稿した写真はカレンダー・よく行くお店順・お気に入り順で自動で記録されていきます。 いつ、どこのお店で何を食べたか、自分の外食記録日記アルバムとして保存しておけるほか、友達の行きつけやお気に入りメニューから、知らなかったお店を発見できるのも楽しさのひとつです。レコーディングダイエットにも最適！ ♪毎日の「おいしい」はお店の情報付きで共有しよう！ 『フェイスブックやツイッターで友達が投稿したランチの写真がとても美味しそうなのに、お店の名前や場所がわからないことありませんか?』 食ベラで撮った写真は簡単にTwitterやFacebookで友達と共有できます。ただ写真を共有できるだけではなく、日本最大級のグルメサイト「食べログ」と連携して、お店の情報付きで共有することができます。 また、食べラから食べログへの写真投稿も可能です。 もちろん、お店をひもづけないでの投稿もできるので、お弁当や手作りのお料理の投稿も大歓迎！ ♪行ったお店や料理の写真でつながろう！ バージョン2.0からの新機能、SNS機能で美味しそうな写真に「食べたい！」したり、友達や気になる他の食べラユーザーを「フォロー」できるようになりました。 ランチもディナーも、ラーメン店・イタリアン・お洒落なカフェ・レストラン・定食屋・居酒屋・バー…日本全国からリアルタイムに投稿される様々なジャンルの美味しそうな料理の写真の数々は、眺めているだけでお腹が空いてきます。 撮影、加工、記録、共有をわかりやすいインターフェイスで一気にできる無料グルメアプリの定番です。 大きなカメラでの撮影は気が引けてしまうあなたも、スマートフォンと食べラで食事の思い出を記録し、共有しましょう！ ※食べログとは? 食べログは月間3,000万人以上が利用する日本最大級の口コミグルメサイトです。全国70万店以上のお店が参加ユーザーの評価をもとに点数付けされているので、リアルなユーザーの評価に基づいたお店探しが可能になるサイトです。各店舗ページではお店の詳細情報だけでなく、そのお店を実際に利用したユーザーの生の感想、投稿写真が多数掲載されており、お店選びの失敗を未然に防ぐことができます。 -- 食べラ 食ベラ たべら タベラ tabera 食べログ 食ベログ Let's share the daily "delicious" ♪ not just a camera app! description: Relaxing Meditation Sounds and Ringtones brings 45 of the most frequently use Relaxing Meditation sounds downloaded from around the internet together into one great Relaxing Meditation sound application. Great Relaxing Meditation sounds which includes Melodies and sounds like, Asian Melodies, Flute Melodies, Guitar Melodies, Indian Melodies, Lullabys, Music Boxes, Nature Melodies and sounds, Piano Melodies, Rainforest Sounds, Tai Chi Melodies and Xylophones Melodies. Easily select any Relaxing Meditation sound or ringtone to play it. Use these great Relaxing Meditation sounds to relax, do Tai Chi, meditate and sleep. Use as a notification, alarm, ringtone and more. Set your default ringtone or SMS with any one of these Relaxing Meditation sounds. Easy to use and have calm soothing sounds around you anytime and anywhere you desire. Features: * 45 Relaxing Meditation Sounds and ringtones * Use as a meditation, calming or sleeping aid * Easily set your default ringtone, notification, alarm or ringtones for a person * Free, no invasive ads Enjoy these free Relaxing Meditation sounds and ringtones! Relaxing Meditation Sounds

Christmas Chic Makeover - Design It Fashion Merry Christmas kids! Welcome to the North Pole makeover and fashion capital! 6 fun holiday activities in 1 xmas app: dressup, makeup, relax in our spa, design your own clothes & take photos to nail on the wall! Show off your makeover skills at Santa Claus's workshop & get ready for an awesome Christmas photoshoot! Meet Dixie, Clara, Joy, and Magi! These chic girls have so many fun activities & events this Christmas: * Get ready for the season with a trip to the Xmas spa & resort! * Design your own outfits! * Dress up for the holiday! * Choose the right makeup before you head out to the red carpet events! * Take a picture with your favourite Christmas girl! * Show off your makeover at the most amazing holiday locations! Get relaxed in the Christmas Spa! Use amazing beauty treatments like the holiday steamer mask, snowflake eye mask, Christmas hair shampoo and even snowflake eye masks! You’ll even get to brush your Xmas girl’s teeth so she’ll have a beautiful smile for all the holiday family photos! You’ll be chic in no time! Design & Choose your Christmas Style! Get out the sewing machine! It’s time to design your own fashion for the upcoming holiday parties! Give your new clothes as a gift! Customize your clothes with special touches like buttons, ribbons and your own fabric and colors. Go from ordinary to chic and be the North Pole’s #1 designer! Merry Makeup! Don’t forget to complete makeup with the latest chic and gorgeous looks for the season with mascara, eyeshadow-- the options for your Xmas beauty routine are endless! Make this the best holiday makeover ever! Time for Holiday Photoshoot! Once you’re satisfied with your look, it’s time to show it off to family and friends! Take a picture or choose a location to photoshoot like the shopping mall, a royal princess palace photo shoot, in the mall, or even in the magical fairy forest! Become the holiday stylist of your dreams! Features: > Design your very own Christmas themed fashion! Make it chic this holiday season! > Click on a girl to decide to which one you’ll give a Christmas makeover! > Swipe through Xmas beauty instruments to reinvent their look with beautiful mascara, blush, eyeshadow, and even earrings! > Choose different clothes to complete her festive fashion apparel! > Tap the spa feature to allow these girls some much needed relaxation during the busy holiday season! > Snap their picture by the Christmas tree and show your creation to family and friends! description: Welcome to the cutest jungle village: Panda Forest Resort! The cuddliest adventure yet! Pamper your panda with spa treatments! Perfect their look! Pretty pandas here we come! Panda Star Power! Explore the studio and card maker gallery! Bring out your creativity! Pamper Your Panda! Meet Pandy, Destiny, Barry, and Ming! These pandas can stop by the Spa! Pamper these colorful and playful pandas! Use special steam, eye masks, and much more to help them relax and get ready for a panda makeover! Panda Fashion! Design their clothes in the Fashion Design boutique! Make it chic and glam by choosing colors, styles, buttons and stickers for their clothes! The selection of dresses, shirts, and hats will make the perfect outfit! Pretty Pandas: Dress Up! Time to get your glam panda fashion on! Select from a stunning variety of fashion, like dresses, shoes and necklaces, to be the most chic panda in the forest! Style them your way! Marvelous Makeup: Panda Perfect! Use fun makeup like eyebrows, tattoos, eye color, earrings, and lips in the Makeup Salon! Make these pandas extra beautiful! Panda Power! Take them to the Card Maker and Recording Studio! These pandas are adorable, and they want to show it to the world! Go to the Card Maker and pick from 6 different panda forest themes: The Beauty Salon, Royal Palace, Dance Floor, Magic Kingdom, Road Trip, and Party House! Once you’ve made a card, check out the recording studio! It’s the perfect place to record your own voice just for the pandas! Features: > Tap the map to visit different studios & journey through the Panda Forest Resort! > Zoom in on the map to see the Panda Forest up close! > Select a character from 4 adorable pandas! > Treat pandas with different colored steamers, face masks, and eye covers. > Swipe through an amazing selection of makeup, like eyebrows, tattoos, earrings, & more! > Drag to design your own amazing panda clothes with paint, stickers, & buttons to add on! > Click to dress up the pandas in sweet outfits of your choosing! > Record your voice in the panda recording studio! > Take a picture in the cardmaker game, with backgrounds, frames and stickers. > Model your design in different panda-themed scenes in the studio and show your family and friends! What's inside: > 6 different studios & activities: dress up, fashion design, spa salon, makeup salon, recording studio and card maker! > 4 adorable pandas! > 38 outfits, 11 dress up categories, 6 makeup categories. > Dozens of accessories like necklaces, scarves, hats, and earrings! > 7 different cleaning tools for the ultimate spa party! > An awesome voice recording feature! > An adorable map to show you all the fun activities! This Christmas, it’s Operation Save Santa! Test your skills in the best extreme adventure of the year! Overcome multiple fun levels in the North Pole as you cure Santa & his helpers! Prepare For The Gift Factory Challenge! An addictive game to see how fast you can wrap presents and win lots of presents & surprises! A Very Merry Dr. X-Mas Ho ho ho! It’s the most wonderful time of the year, and it’s time to play the best Christmas App on the App Store! Santa and his helpers are in danger, and it’s up to you Doctor X to save the day and save all the presents! In this holiday app, you need to journey through the North Pole and save Santa and friends along the way! Jolly Christmas Journey Start at Santa’s house, where you’ll find him too sick to even jump in his sleigh! Cure his ills by using the appropriate tools, like ice picks, pumps, and hair dryers-- but you’re not in the clear yet, Doctor X! Each stop along the way is a challenge to your skills. You’ll even have to fix Santa’s broken nose, but careful that you attach the right one! Cure them all, and you’ll save Christmas! Operation Save Santa! Santa and his helpers suffer from all kinds of illnesses and accidents! You’ll need to help an elf that’s been run over by a sleigh, Rudolph who’s stuck in a tree, and Santa again who’s a little too chubby for the chimney and got stuck! Santa will need all sorts of help from funny problems too, like when he has the wrong nose on! Your presents won’t just be under the tree this year, either! Win awesome gifts along your journey to help you cure your next patients! Gift Factory Challenge Stop by Santa’s factory to complete Christmas wrapping and packing! When you play, you’ll earn presents like bandages to help you save more Christmas helpers in the next levels! The elves need your help this year to wrap all the presents, stop at the factory to give them a hand! Christmas needs to be saved, and only you can do it, Doctor X! Features: > Tap to choose from a selection of different tools like bandages, ice picks & more to save Santa & friends! > Drag cursor to quickly wrap and pack presents inside the factory! > Journey through multiple different levels by completing each challenge at the North Pole! > Win presents like bandages and magic tools along the path to help you in your next medical adventure! What's inside: > 1 map to track your saga as you complete each activity! > 8 different Christmas levels to journey through and cure your patient! > 22 awesome tools to cure Santa and all of his helpers! > Dozens of perfectly wrapped presents! > 3 fun Christmas characters to cure: Santa, Rudolph, and an elf! > 1 challenging mini game at Santa’s factory! description: The Fabulous Aesop's Fable of the Fox and the Crow like Never Before! Gorgeous HD Illustrations and Spectacular Storytelling Incredible Interactive Activities Give this Classic Story a Modern Makeover The Fox and the Crow StoryBook for Kids is a beautiful interactive retelling of Aesop's famous fable that teaches children an important lesson in life - to not pay attention to flattery. Aesop's the Fox and the Crow’s timeless tale comes to life like never before!!! Enjoy amazing interactive activities, superb animation and brilliant sound effects your children are sure to enjoy. Aesop's The Fox and the Crow StoryBook for Kids is a classic fairytale. It’s a family favorite young kids and parents will LOVE to read together! What’s Inside The Fox and the Crow StoryBook for Kids: ★ Help the fox search for food - interactive activity ★ Watch how the fox flatters the crow trying to receive a prize - interactive activity ★ Help the crow reveal the fox’s attempts to trick him - interactive activity ★ Watch how the crow finally gives in and drops the cheese - interactive activity Aesop's the Fox and the Crow is a great story addition to every household. The timeless tale that warns people to be wary of flattery, will resonate with parents as they teach life lessons to their children. The fantastic HD illustrations and amazing sound effects greatly enhance this classic story, giving it a modern makeover. description: Creative Chefs Can Make & Bake Awesome Mac and Cheese! Get Cooking! Play Pasta Chef in an Amazing, Yummy Game! Bake & Decorate Your Mac & Cheese, Set a Fun Table & Eat! What’s for dinner? Parents know that Mac & Cheese is a kid’s favorite food. Now it’s an awesome game too! Making Mac & Cheese has never been so fun and delicious! Kids can play pasta chef and get creative in the kitchen cooking their own fancy Macaroni & Cheese. Kids can make the cheese sauce from scratch & cook up the food on their own. Put the ingredients into a bowl and mix it up with a spoon. Then kids will place the pasta into the oven to bake. But wait, there’s more! In the Crazy Chef Mac & Cheese Maker, kid can decorate their pasta creations with dozens of food toppings to choose from. Little macaroni chefs can get busy in the kitchen and make this classic kids’ food favorite something special. A great food app for the whole family to inspire cooking together. Parents will love watching their kids get excited about cooking too. The Crazy Chef Mac & Cheese Maker is a fantastic family cooking game! What's inside Crazy Chef Mac & Cheese Maker ★ Mix up ingredients: mustard, milk, cheese ..and make the perfect cheese sauce ★ Place the macaroni & cheese into the oven to bake! Don’t let the macaroni burn! ★ Decorate your pasta to make food faces with tons of veggies & potato chips toppings ★ Set your table! Dozens of items including: bowls, plates, napkins, drinks and more ★ Eat and drink it! Kids can gobble up their food and drink a yummy beverage - many to choose! Crazy Chef Mac & Cheese Maker Features ★ Touch & drag to mix up the ingredients ★ Cool smiley-face thermometer with colors & faces tells kids when the food is ready ★ Press the “RESTART” button and kids can eat their macaroni & drink all over again! ★ Improved menu system - makes navigation easier The Crazy Chef Mac & Cheese Maker is an amazing virtual cooking game for the whole family. Kids will make, bake, decorate and eat their yummy pasta creations. Mac & Cheese has never been so fun!
